Yamanami Keisuke, vice-commander and later secretary-general of the Shinsengumi, a security organization primarily active in the Bakumatsu-era Kyoto. 

He is said to have been born in Mutsu Province in Sendai, but the details of his origin and background are unknown. 

He once challenged Isami Kondo, of the Tennen Rishin-ryu dojo Shieikan, to a match, and lost. At this time, he grew to respect Kondo's character, and thereafter studied together with him as fellow disciples. He participated in the Roshigumi and the founding of the Mibu Roshigumi in Kyoto, and eventually became a central part of the Shinsengumi.
1:
Height/weight: 169cm/55kg

Source: Historical fact

Region: Japan

Alignment: Lawful Good

Gender: Male

“The kind Yamanami-san”
2:
Even as a part of the Shinsengumi, which possessed many hot-blooded members, he was known for his calm, gentle personality. 

Together with Kondo and others, he joined the Roshigumi, which was tasked with the protection of the shogun. After this, under the custody of the Aizu clan, he formed the Mibu Roshigumi. Within the ranks were the Serizawa faction, composed of Mito clan samurai, and the Kondo faction, which had been established since the days of the Shieikan.

Along with Hijikata Toshizo, Yamanami was appointed vice-commander of the Kondo faction. Thereafter the Roshigumi was recognized for its work. It was given a new name, the Shinsengumi, and its presence continued to strengthen. However, the internal feud between the Serizawa and Kondo factions grew stronger by the day, until the Shinsengumi was finally united under Kondo's faction with the purge of the Serizawa faction. 

Yamanami assumed the position of secretary general alongside Kondo, the commander, and Hijikata, the vice-commander. He played a central role in the Shinsengumi.

Despite his graceful appearance, he is a man capable in both military and literary arts, and his swordsmanship lived up to the Shinsengumi name. 


“With that said, compared to Okita-kun and Saito-kun, I can’t boast of my skills.”
3:
In February of the second year of Genji, Yamanami left behind a letter and deserted from the Shinsengumi. By Shinsengumi law, desertion was punishable by seppuku, and pursuers were immediately sent after him. 

Yamanami, who had been on his way to Edo, was caught up to and detained by Okita in Otsu. 

There are various theories as to the reason behind his desertion, including those regarding the relocation of the corps' base and his feud with Kondo and Hijikata, but his true intention remains unclear. 

His close friends advised him to flee once more, but he refused. On February 23, Genji 2, he committed seppuku.


Ito Kashitaro, with whom Yamanami had shared a close bond, composed a poem in mourning of his death.


"Mountain cherry blossoms, blowing in the spring breeze / When they fall, will they not be missed?"

"Rather than wilting away in the blowing wind, the mountain cherry blossom / that scatters without a trace is braver.”
4:
Warrior But Literate: C

A way to describe Yamanami, who excels both in literary and martial arts. To say it in another way, even as a part of the Shinsengumi, a group of unscrupulous individuals, he was regarded both inside and outside the organization as a man of learning who understood reason.


Beauty of Nature: C

Even within its softness, Yamanami's swordsmanship possesses a keen sense of reason. Due to an old injury, he sometimes has trouble using his arm.


The Kind One: B

His kindness and warm-heartedness were admired by the women and children of Mibu, and there was a saying handed down in the Shinsengumi: “The kind ones are Yamanami and Matsubara.”


“The kind one, Sannan-san... I'm not that type of person. I was just a coward.”
5:
『 Yamazakura 』

Rank: D

Type: Anti-Army

Range: 1-5

Maximum targets: 30 people


Mountain cherry blossoms. 

The mountain cherry blossoms from the day we gathered with our friends, ran with our friends, killed our friends, fled from our friends. An enhanced Noble Phantasm that gathers one's own flagging Spirit Origin to strengthen one's allies. Originally, it was a suicidal Noble Phantasm that cast away the entire Spirit Origin, but through acceptance and acknowledgement of one's past, it was sublimated into an Anti-Army Noble Phantasm. A farewell to the self of that day. 


“———I won't run away any longer."
6:
———I’ve always been running. From the Shinsengumi, from my friends, even from myself.

Yamanami supported the Shinsengumi as its secretary general, and in return was given his comrades’ deep trust. Even so, due to his kind-hearted nature, he eventually grew tired of the corps’ infighting and, purge by purge, his spirit was worn down.

Still, he told himself that this was the right thing to do, and continued to run with his comrades, to fight to open the era’s way forward.

Running, running, always running.

Then, one day, he turned around.

His own weakness, his own inadequacy—every day he regretted them, and asked himself if there wasn’t another way. “Where are we headed, having killed our own friends?”

Before he realized it, he had cast everything aside and run away.

Floating on the face of the water that reflects the moonlight is a single mountain cherry blossom, swallowed up by the waves of the era.

Ah… Everyone of the Shinsengumi…

———I leave it all to you.

传说中的邪马台国的二代女王。在魏志倭人传中，记载有初代女王卑弥呼亡故后，年纪轻轻便登上女王之位的壹与重整了混乱的国家一事。
然而从此往后的记载中，邪马台国忽然便没有了踪迹，自历史的阴影中消去了。
同壹与相关的一切则是和卑弥呼一样的谜团重重，直到今天也没有明确的形象故事。
1:
身高／体重：155cm·43kg
出处：魏志倭人传
地域：日本
属性：秩序·恶　　性别：女性
「给我介绍一下嘛~！介绍！介绍！介绍！」
2:
作为卑弥呼的后继治理邪马台国的壹与。虽然在卑弥呼之后首先立作后继的是男性王，但对此表示不服的人们随即让国家陷入了混乱，最终以不久之后壹与成为二代女王并平息混乱一事作为收场。
壹与虽然向晋朝武帝朝贡、也努力地治理国家，但作为巫女的力量却不及卑弥呼，邪马台国最终也慢慢地走向灭亡。

「虽然这些看起来都是因为我不好，但是，该说
　这其实并不全是我的错呢，还是该说这是卑弥呼说的
　那个呢……。哼~对不起啦~」

和总而言之用很厉害的力量轰隆！一下解决问题的感觉的天然系卑弥呼不同，是擅长高水平的细密魔力操作的风格。据说各种华丽的邪马台国女王蹴击技在民众当中也人气极高。

「不听人讲话的坏人，痛快点踢飞
　就好啦！」

说到底，这难道不就是用拳击还是用踢击的区别吗？
3:
虽然卑弥呼已经够谜团重重但比她还要谜团重重的壹与的出生。追根究底，壹与原本是与邪马台国敌对的狗奴国的巫女。
生来就被视作毁灭之巫女，本是被狗奴国的咒术师狗古智卑古当作活祭品抚养长大的壹与，在与邪马台国的战乱当中，被敌国的女王卑弥呼发现，并被收作了她的弟子。
本就有狗奴的咒术，又学习了卑弥呼的鬼道，壹与从此发挥出了她原本的才能。虽是操使光之力量的卑弥呼的弟子，却作为操使暗之力量的巫女施展力量。

尽管她身上蕴藏的才能连卑弥呼都禁不住惊叹，但奈何她自己十分嫌恶自己的力量，因此不能够将之完全运用起来。

「像卑弥呼那样不得了的力量对我来说就不太行
　……不过你看，那部分就该靠技术来弥补对吧，
　就是这样的感觉，请多指教！」
4:
○鬼道（灭）：B
原始的魔术。也有说法称其为神道的原型。
与成体系的魔术体系不同，详情充满了谜团。作为卑弥呼后继者的壹与同样能够操使鬼道，但说到底壹与的鬼道和卑弥呼的本来就不是一个系统。

○暗之神谕：B
与卑弥呼的光之神谕成对的技能。同与星辰通信的卑弥呼不同，是与大地深渊通信的壹与一人的神谕。通过潜藏在大地的黑暗幽邃中的某种存在的声音，对未来进行占卜。

○终末巫女：C
在将她视作毁灭一切的征兆的狗奴所流传的毁灭之巫女。据说与她扯上关系的人，无一不会踏上毁灭一途。和“黑色星期五（Premium Friday）”什么的并没有什么关系。

○狗奴咒法：C
狗奴国流传的将野兽之力寄宿于人身的原始强化魔术。为人之肉身涂抹上兽之灵魂从而获取力量。若是过度使用身体便会兽化的危险咒术。

○天然的肢体：B
柔韧而美丽的手脚。是原始人所拥有的充盈着活力的美好肉体。Slender Body。
以优美的力度释放强力蹴击的令人惊叹的修长美腿。因为力量上弱于卑弥呼所以在技巧方面进行了补足。与卑弥呼不同，是不管怎么吃也不会发胖的体质。
5:
『遮掩暮夜之月御珠』
阶级：C　种类：对军宝具
有效范围：14　最大捕捉：140人

Yoiyamikageru Tsukinomitama
同盘踞于大地深渊中的某种存在通信，并借其力量操使的魔术。真名解放时会通过勾玉进行魔力扩散，使大范围内的对象的心灵遭到污染、灵魂走向凋零。是毁灭之巫女壹与作出的破灭神谕。
壹与令同卑弥呼的光之力量相异的，作为咒术师的暗之才能开花结果的宝具。

「该不会，这会给人留下不好的印象吧？」
6:
曾经十分恐惧直视月亮。恐惧映照在夜空中的那只眼瞳。

从降生起就被当作毁灭之巫女，被周围的人所疏远，不得不在幽暗的石室当中目送生命流逝的可悲少女。

但这一定不是周围的人单方面造成的境遇。再怎么说壹与也的确作为毁灭之巫女而拥有着力量。
仅仅只是存在于此就会为周身的一切带去破灭的终结之力。从降生于世开始，杀害亲人，杀害一族之人，据说最终甚至杀害了国家那份力量。

就在她对寄宿于己身的力量感到绝望，放弃了所有，觉得就在幽暗的石室里沉入地底就好的那个时候。

——有光。

那是突然出现的，耀眼而温暖的某种存在。被仿佛能包容所有的、大大的、非常大的力量所引导，毁灭之巫女得以在蓝天下迈出步伐。

但是，终其一生，她到底也没能正确地看待那份破灭的力量。不，应该说她自己认为自己做不到。

「不过，现在正是正确使用这份力量的时候！」

那究竟是映照在夜空之上的，潜藏于地底的■的眼瞳，还是自己的内心呢。直到今天我也没能搞明白。只是，那一天，在那昏暗的石室中洒下的光芒。那就是对我而言无可替代的神谕。

即便那就是终结的起始也无所谓。

星在天，无赖在地。
「水浒传」中冠以天威星之名的首屈一指的强人。

名为「连环马」的战法蹂躏战场的官兵将军。
两手持有名为铁鞭的武器，
作为“双鞭”呼延灼而声名远扬。

「明明就只写了我强的地方！就只写了强的！」

○在水浒传中
于作品第五十四回华丽登场。
应杀害了堂弟高廉的高俅的命令，
被任命为征讨梁山泊的将领。
随副将韩滔、彭玘，援军“轰天雷”凌振一同
将梁山泊军逼入了绝境（这三人
后来也上了梁山）。

然而，他所擅长的连环马战法被徐宁的名为钩镰枪
的武器击破，经过好一番迂回曲折，
最终上了梁山。

武器虽然叫铁鞭，但并非是通常所说的
皮制鞭，非要说的话更接近棒的形制。
并非是以斩击，而是以敲击来攻击的武器。

原型人物是历史上真实存在的将领呼延赞。
在设定上是他的子孙后代。

「很厉害吧。基本上尽是写的相当不错的
  东西哦！」
3:
○关于恩浦萨
希腊神话中，被称作赫卡忒之子的怪物。
拥有驴的下半身，其中一只腿是青铜或是黄铜制的。
因会化作美丽的少女，吸取男性的精气并杀死他们
而为人所恐惧，但据说只要遭到言辞激烈的辱骂，
就会发出悲鸣并退散。
另外，其名字也被用来指称一属的螳螂。

「这个！　都是这个的错！　可恶的教授！
　可恶的燕青！」
4:
○幻兽凭依：C

从而进行了灵基补完的状态。

○双鞭：A
呼延灼是使铁鞭的名家，梁山泊的无赖汉们
也曾深受其苦。

○天威星：A
传说会带来灾难的一百零八星的转生者之一。
魔星的重生，
天生背负着灾厄。
那以猛烈的势头讨灭敌人的姿态足以使其位列五虎之将。

○脆弱精神：EX
幻兽恩浦萨的精神极其脆弱，
即便与呼延灼合体也无法抵消，
于是最终升华为了一种技能。
具体来说，就是被骂的话会消沉沮丧。
是认可欲的集合体。
但被夸过头了的话思考回路也会熔断，
直接宕机。

「我的技能组很优秀对吧！　夸夸我也
　可以哦！　夸夸我吧！　求你了！」

Empousa Chain Tempest
呼延灼所擅长的连环马战法的拟似再现宝具。
将暂时召唤出的重装战马以锁链连结，以无匹的势头
进行突进。如同巨大的风暴一般吞噬、摆弄一切。

只不过，因为水浒传的传承而具备的镰状武器这一弱点，
即便在神秘侧也依然是弱点。
遭到镰刀系的武器或宝具（格蕾、美杜莎等）抵抗的话，威力就会显著下降。

另外，或许是因为恩浦萨的凭依，也不太能应对高音量的状况。
是一旦被发现了弱点就会变得羸弱的类型的从者。

「只要用对地方就很强的啦！　只要用对地方！　真的！」
6:
○关于幻灵合体后的呼延灼
在新宿时，莫里亚蒂与巴力共同开发出的
复合从者之一骑。
本来是打算将来自赫卡忒之子，或是被传述为赫卡忒分身的
魔兽的变身能力，同在「水浒传」中拥有顶尖的
攻击能力的呼延灼相组合，并进一步将称得上是
恩浦萨的弱点的精神面进行补强的。
然而，尽管以呼延灼为素材，
精神面的弱化却依然没能克服。
虽然即便如此也有着令人瞠目结舌的战斗力，
但还是被莫里亚蒂判定废弃，而与二重身顺利完成
合体的燕青则获得了最终胜利。

至于这些被废弃的数据究竟是在哪儿、以什么方式混进来的，
恐怕是因为恰赫季斯的，或者伊丽亲的
不可思议的力量之类的，经过这样那样的工序
才以呼延灼的身份被召唤出来，这样的感觉？

「什么叫这样那样啊？！　这才是重点吧？！
　还有，“感觉”又是几个意思啊！！」

第一再临虽然是一副冷酷无情的暗杀者的样子，
但再临之后马上就会露出真面目。

在恰赫季斯梁山泊的骚动中，以官军身份出阵。
得到了御主（的分身）的夸奖，认可欲求得到了满足，
决心要攻下梁山泊，不过……

——万里无云的晴空下，熠熠生辉的梁山泊。
那是证明了即便身为无可救药的恶党，也能够拯救世界的，
满载骄傲的记忆。

黄飞虎是『封神演义』中的登场人物。
乃是武艺高强的达人，据说乘着名为五色神牛的十分特别的牛。

最初身为殷商的镇国武成王侍奉纣王，
但以妻子和妹妹因妲己的谋划而被杀害一事为契机，
决意举族投奔向西岐的武王麾下。
在那时，一边同不断袭来的敌人作战，一边突破了五道关隘。
与西岐的军队、太公望等人会合的黄飞虎成了开国武成王，与他们一同为了伐纣而向殷商进军，而在这途中毙于敌人刀下。

有黄天化、黄天禄、黄天爵、黄天祥四个儿子。
1:
身高／体重：192cm·92kg
出处：『封神演义』
地域：中国
属性：混沌·善　　性别：男性
在身为开国武成王的情况下是「混沌・善」，而在身为镇国武成王的情况下则会变成「秩序・善」。
2:
黄飞虎乃是封神演义中登场的主要人物之一。
身为七代往上就开始侍奉殷商王朝的名门黄氏一族的一员，最初是以「镇国武成王」的身份、大将军的立场，作为一位正当的王侍奉着纣王。然而，自纣王迎娶了被妖狐李代桃僵的苏妲己为妻开始，状况便改变了。
在妲己的蛊惑之下，纣王逐渐变得荒淫无道，
国家与天下的泰平也开始失却。
而在醉酒的妲己在宫廷现出真身意图食人之时，并未察觉到她的真面目的黄飞虎
用金眼神莺抓伤了她的脸。
于是，对黄飞虎怀恨在心的妲己设计让黄飞虎之妻贾氏自尽，还让身为纣王侧室的黄妃（黄飞虎的妹妹）为纣王所杀。
以这一事件为导火索，黄飞虎才下定了反抗殷商的决心。
3:
归顺了周朝的黄飞虎受封「开国武成王」之位，与太公望（姜子牙）、哪吒、黄天化等人一同作为讨伐军的将领同纣王派遣的军队交战，并将其悉数击破。
随后，为了打倒纣王和妲己，终于向着朝歌（殷商首都）开始了进军。
黄飞虎等人自然同行，并在这其中打倒了许许多多的敌人——但，在朝歌已是近在眼前的渑池县，黄飞虎被驻守在那里的武将张奎以及其妻高兰英的宝贝夺去了性命。
这是他为了报答为儿子黄天化报仇的同伴的大恩而主动出阵的结局。

妻妹之仇经由同伴之手得报，黄飞虎的魂魄经太公望之手得以封神，获封掌管地狱的「东岳泰山天齐仁圣大帝」（东岳大帝）之位。
4:
○黄家的牵绊：B
封神演义中，黄飞虎一族登场的人物尤其多，而且都担任着重要的角色。
然而包括黄飞虎本人在内，大部分人都没能活到与纣王、妲己的决战。
仿佛受到了这份遗憾的托付，身为从者的黄飞虎是以与长子·黄天化为首的黄氏一族相连接的状态现界的。
如同眷属或是使魔一般，在一定程度上可以借取一族之人的力量来使用。
只不过这一族之人平时基本不会以独立的姿态出现。虽然在战斗时可以看到儿子们的身姿，但那也只是斗气密度升高从而发生的暂时性现象。

偶尔好像也能似有似无地听到妻子的声音。

○金眼神莺：A
据说是黄飞虎得自北海的，
装在赤红色鸟笼中的神莺。
据说某次纣王同妲己设宴，在众人尽皆烂醉如泥的深夜，妲己为了物色可以入口的人类而显出真身徘徊，微醺的黄飞虎因感到不祥的气息飞身而起，解放了金眼神莺，而神莺立即双目赤红，以钢钩般的利爪袭向妖狐，使其面部受伤。黄飞虎便因此而被妲己记恨了。
5:
『黄飞虎反五关·天化莫耶宝剑』
阶级：A　种类：对人宝具
有效范围：1~10　最大捕捉：1人

Kouhiko Hangokan Tenka Bakuyahouken
黄飞虎对殷商失望而降周之际，突破了路途上的
五道关隘这一著名的故事片段的部分具象化的产物。
和牛若丸的遮那王流离谭在类型上比较相似。
身为从者的黄飞虎能够借取在那时成为助力的
有缘人，特别是家人的力量并加以行使。

五道关隘之一关，潼关的片段如下。
潼关乃是由黄飞虎曾经的部下，对黄飞虎怀恨在心的名为陈桐的将军守卫。
陈桐和黄飞虎以枪交战，而黄飞虎占了上风。意识到无法取胜的陈桐忍不住脱逃，并朝着追击而来的黄飞虎投掷了自仙人处获授的名为火龙标的飞行道具。
黄飞虎便从神牛上跌落，虽有同伴搭救，但此时黄飞虎已经死去了。
正在黄氏一族陷入悲叹当中的时候，自三岁起便行踪不明，实则是自那时起十三年来始终在道德真君门下修行的黄飞虎之长子·黄天化为了帮助父亲而现身。
他用得自道德真君处的仙药救活了黄飞虎，并因得知黄飞虎等人的现状以及母亲和姑姑为纣王等人所杀一事而勃然大怒。与父亲一同对抗起陈桐来。天化用奇妙不可思议的花篮收去了陈桐的火龙标，
并用师尊赐予的「莫耶宝剑」砍下了陈桐的脑袋——

莫耶宝剑本是道德真君的山宝，据说是凭借放出的光芒便可斩落人头的宝贝。
身为从者的黄飞虎，通过这段故事借取力量，便可以将这本来属于黄天化持有的事物当作自己持有的宝具。

另外，与其他持有「莫耶」之铭的剑之间的关系不明。
6:
○FGO中的人物像
记挂着家族牵绊的一族之主、忠义之士。
但，「真正的忠义为何物？」这样的想法始终困扰着他。

因为妻子和妹妹被杀害的愤怒，黄飞虎脱离了殷商转而投向周，在突破关隘的途中，他也曾数次陷入迷茫。
纣王毫无疑问是正统之王。身为侍奉王朝七代的一族中的一员，自己的背叛真的是正确的吗。
妻子和妹妹的死、恶政、纣王的暴虐无道，这些都确确实实是不容饶恕的事情。然而，就因为这些，就能以此为由不再为臣了吗——
当然，在这之后，太公望等人也屡次告诉他「穷极了大逆无道之事、人心涣散的王天命当尽。臣子选择出逃别国也是理所当然」，黄飞虎也以真心接纳了这一切，与他们一同战斗，但即便如此，他的内心深处也一直抱有「自己真的是正确的吗。究竟什么又才是正确的呢」这样作为武人的疑问。

以从者之姿现界的他，发现这一想法不仅没有得到疏解，反而愈发强烈。
这也是理所当然。毕竟从者是无法选择自己的御主的。
眼前的这位御主，会是像过去的纣王那样的大逆不道之徒的可能性也并非没有。
在那样的情况下，自己又该如何是好呢。
究竟何为「正确」呢——？
心系着家族的武人，只是一边以真挚的目光评判着御主，一边始终抱持着这一疑问。

Huang Feihu is a character in The Investiture of the Gods.

He was described as a martial arts expert and the rider of a special bull named Wuse Shenniu (Five-colored Divine Ox).


He started off serving King Zhòu as the Prince of Wu Cheng Who Guards the Kingdom of Yin. But his wife being killed by Daji's stratagems was the last straw for him. He and his family switched allegiances to King Wu of Xiqi.

To do this, he had to cross 5 checkpoints while fighting against wave after wave of enemies.

After uniting with Taigong Wang's Xiqi forces, he was named Prince of Wu Cheng Who Founds the Kingdom and joined them in the campaigns to take down King Zhòu, but he was felled by the enemy's blade along the way.


He has 4 sons: Huang Tianhua, Huang Tianlu, Huang Tianjue, and Huang Tianxiang.
1:
Height/Weight: 192cm / 92kg

Source: Investiture of the Gods

Region: China

Alignment: Chaotic Good

Gender: Male

Chaotic Good while Prince of Wu Cheng Who Founds the Kingdom, Lawful Good while Prince of Wu Cheng Who Guards the Kingdom.
2:
Huang Feihu is a major character in The Investiture of the Gods.

He was a member of the distinguished Huang Family that had served the Shang (Yin) Dynasty for 7 generations, and as such, he served the righteous King Zhòu under the commanding position of royal general and the prestigious title of Prince of Wu Cheng. However, everything started changing when his king married Su Daji, a fox monster in disguise.

Under Daji's enchantments, the king started committing inhuman deeds, causing the nation and its government to gradually lose its peace.

And when the drunk Daji revealed her true form in the Imperial Court and tried to eat people, Huang Feihu's Golden-eyed Divine Warbler scarred her face before Feihu realized what she truly was.

This led Daji to hold a grudge against Huang Feihu, and because of this, Daji's trickery drove Lady Jia (Feihu's wife) into jumping off a window and King Zhòu into killing Huang Fei (Feihu's sister and King Zhou's concubine).

This incident was the last straw triggering Huang Feihu's rebellion against Yin.
3:
Upon swearing his allegiance to the Zhōu forces, Huang Feihu was granted the title of Prince of Wu Cheng Who Founds the Kingdom and led the army with his companions Taigong Wang (Jiang Ziya), Nezha, Huang Tianhua, and many more. Together they defeated every punitive force that King Zhòu send their way.

And when it came time to take down Daji and Zhòu, they marched to Zhaoge (Yin's capital).

Obviously, Huang Feihu joined the march and defeated various enemies on his path, but in Mianchi County, when Zhaoge was before his eyes, the protector of the county, Commander Zhang Kui took Feihu's life using his wife Gao Lanying's paope.

That was the result of Huang Feihu rushing into battle to repay his companions for the grand favor of avenging his son Huang Tianhua's death.


After his companions avenged Feihu's wife and sister by giving Daji and King Zhòu their just deserts, Taigong Wang sealed Feihu's soul in the form of god Dongyue Taishan Tianqi Rensheng Dadi (shortened to Dongyue Dadi), the governor of hell.
4:
• Bonds of the Huang Family: B

In The Investiture of the Gods, Huang Feihu's family contains a lot of named characters playing important roles.

However, most of them, Feihu included, were unable to participate in the final battle against Daji and King Zhòu.

As if their regrets are passed down from son to father, Feihu's Servant manifestation comes linked with members of the Huang clan, including his eldest son Huang Tianhua.

He can borrow the powers of his clan members to some extent, like they were familiars or retainers.

But under normal circumstances, his family members will not be independent entities. You may be able to see his sons in combat, but that's a temporary form made from highly concentrated fighting spirit.


• Jinyan Shenying: A

The Golden-eyed Divine Warbler. A divine warbler in a red birdcage. It's said Huang Feihu obtained it in the northern seas.

Late on the night of King Zhòu and Daji's banquet, when everyone was drunk beyond their dignity, Daji found this to be a fine opportunity to eat humans, so she started wandering about in her true form. Startled by the sinister presence he was feeling, the tipsy Huang Feihu opened his cage, releasing Jinyan Shenying. Once freed, the warbler's eyes turned red and it assaulted the fox with its steel hook-like talons, scarring her face. This led Daji to hold a grudge against Feihu.
5:
Huang Feihu Hanwuguan: Tianhua Mo Ye Baojian (Huang Feihu's five-checkpoint opposition: Tianhua's Sword of Mo Ye)

Rank: A

Type: Anti-Unit Noble Phantasm

Range: 1-10

Max. Targets: 1 person

A partial concretization of the famed incident where Huang Feihu broke through 5 checkpoints in his desertion from Yin to Zhōu.

A Noble Phantasm of a similar sort to Ushiwakamaru's Shanaou Ryuuritan.

It enables the Servant version of Huang Feihu to borrow the powers of the relatives who helped him travel, especially his sons.


The following situation happened in the Tong Pass, one of those checkpoints:

The checkpoint was guarded by General Chen Tong, a former subordinate of Huang Feihu who held a grudge against him.

Chen Tong and Huang Feihu locked spears, and Feihu had the advantage. Tong immediately ran away once he realized it was a battle he couldn't win. Feihu pursued but Tong threw his Fire Dragon's Dart, a present he had received from a Xian, in his direction.

Huang Feihu fell off his ox and had to be rescued by his family, but at this point, he was already dead.

While the family grieved, Feihu's eldest son, Huang Tianhua appeared. Tianhua had disappeared at the tender age of 3 and spent these past 13 years training under Daode Zhenjun before showing up to save his father.

Using the Xian medicine Daode Zhenjun gave him, he brought Feihu back to life. In doing so, he learned that King Zhòu killed his mother and aunt and became furious. Father and son faced Chen Tong together. Tianhua absorbed Tong's Fire Dragon's Dart into a mysterious flower basket, then cut his head with the weapon his mentor gave him: the Sword of Mo Ye.


The Sword of Mo Ye is the treasure of Daode Zhenjun's mountain. A paope that lops people's heads off with the light it emits.

Servant Huang Feihu can borrow Huang Tianhua's Noble Phantasm as his own, including the power from stories associated with Tianhua.

It’s association with other swords engraved with the name 'Moye’ is unknown.

星在天，无赖在地。
那九纹龙伊丽莎呢！
是九纹龙史进，与伊丽莎白·巴托里合体的，
恶魔般设想的从者！

职阶，Pretender！
1:
身高/体重：127cm・29kg

通常来说，史进的龙字是不一样的。史进是“龍”，
伊丽莎是“竜”。
「误用字，看来是变多了啊！」
2:
于恰赫季斯城突兀现身的谜之黑影。
虽然伊丽莎白与被召唤的史进一同战斗，
但却被早早拿到圣杯的他们打败了。
不过，跌倒了可不会单纯爬起来就了事的伊丽亲，
选择了与史进合体。
把恰赫季斯城当作梁山泊，以九纹龙伊丽莎的身份
如不死鸟般复活！！
因为这样不可思议的事情也就伊丽亲能做到了，
好孩子和好从者们还请不要模仿哦。
3:
○单独行动：B+
九纹龙伊丽莎乃是如游云般的存在。

○阵地建造（梁山泊）：EX
九纹龙伊丽莎持有名为“结成梁山泊”的，
原本只有宋江和晁盖才会持有的
十分可怕的能力。
是因为第二宝具的影响从而获得的技能。
除了梁山泊以外的东西是建不出来的。

○呐喊之声·梁山泊：EX
令梁山泊上的好汉们集结起来的特级技能。
「梁山泊的大家的思绪，
　都汇集到我这里了！」

「想为了受苦的百姓做些什么啊」「想大碗吃酒」
「想杀个人啊」「想举办宴会啊」「想大口吃肉」
「想盗些什么」「想开发大炮啊」

「基本上来说，都不是什么正经事啊！」
实际上是由第二宝具的同伴们微妙地携来的
能力的更迭变化。

○极大宴会·梁山泊：EX
梁山泊的大家开办的盛大宴会。
一整天里喧哗吵闹，
向周边环境播撒噪音与欢愉以及其它种种。
从技能角度来说的话，是黄金律的亚种、反转。
当这个技能被发动的场合，周围的人们都会大量消费金钱，沉湎于饮宴和欢乐之中。
也许是伊丽莎白「孤身一人很寂寞」的想法
构筑出了这一技能。

○天微星的外披：C
伊丽莎白·巴托里转为九纹龙伊丽莎的核心技能。
身披天微星之力的她，既是伊丽莎白的同时，
也持有九纹龙史进的力量。

之所以变为幼小姿态，是因为她是在身为伊丽莎白·巴托里的
灵基得以确定之前，先作为天微星而具备了力量的状态。
照实说，也就是闹着玩儿结果变成了九纹龙史进的伊丽亲。
4:
『九大青龙姬·流星天！』
阶级：A-　种类：对宋宝具
有效范围：1~10　最大捕捉：30人

Jiulong Elichan Shooting Star!
后半部分不知道为什么变成了平假名注音。

「这可是九次的同时攻击啊！
　肯定是，那个什么多重次元曲折现象
　之类的啦！」

伊丽亲虽然这样说，但实际上只是因为是梁山泊的
同伴们（这是只将用第二宝具集结起来的同伴的
部分进行了强化）负责了剩下的八次
攻击造成的不一致而已。
从表象看来就是将历代的伊丽莎白
当作力量的象征来召唤。

那份形姿便如同流星一般。
也因此有着如果在室内释放威力就会减半的鬼点子设想。

话虽如此，因为是从者们的九次连续攻击，
威力还是很高的。

　　◆

『再结成梁山泊·好汉大募集！』
阶级：EX　种类：对宋宝具
有效范围：1　最大捕捉：108人

大家集结起来，属于我们的水浒传！
成为万圣节活动契机的宝具。
为了发动这一宝具，伊丽亲和御主
集结了108位从者，结成了梁山泊。
虽然能令召唤从者一事变得更为简单，
但地点限定在恰赫季斯城周边，且
只有九纹龙伊丽莎才能发动，所以并没有
例外的使用方法。
也说不定，这一切都只是自己的错觉呢，
也有这样可怕的可能性存在。
但伊丽亲仍然相信着。
有着会响应自己的呼唤的，温柔的你
存在这件事。
5:
今年的伊丽亲也是大丰收！
可以说是十年一度的伊丽莎白好节气吧。

……综上所述而前来的九纹龙伊丽莎。
既保留了天衣无缝、唯我独尊的普通的伊丽莎白的形象，
又兼具了天真烂漫、惹人亲近的极为普通的少女的可爱，
简直就是奇迹的第七伊丽莎白。
（机械的两个算作一个）
尽管如此，还是可以窥见的其残酷性，
是源自伊丽莎白呢，还是和九纹龙史进
混在一起的缘故呢，这尚且不明。

另外，与历代的伊丽莎白有着决定性的不同，
她对偶像完全没有兴趣。
虽然喜欢唱歌，但这并不包含在身为偶像的
范畴当中。

和九纹龙史进只是暂时性的共同战斗，
关系既称不上太好也不能说有多坏，
不过在强敌面前会齐心协力。

此外，九纹龙史进变身为了九节棍。
不仅实际上有自我意识，还能说话。
6:
在『108人的万圣节·反抗！』中登场。
令伊丽莎白的多样性……多样性？得以开拓，
是全新的伊丽莎白一族……一族？成员。

作为Pretender身披的角色，
乃是『水浒传』中有名的好汉，九纹龙史进。
藉由他的力量，即便原本是近乎无力的幼童姿态，
似乎也能够以从者的身份战斗了。

最喜欢以前印有梁山泊一百零八将图案的洋画。现在出的洋画也是最喜欢。
一定要保密的一件事，就是她最讨厌孤身一人。
就因为这个，当呼延灼站在她的对立面时，
才相当地受打击。

随笑随哭，随闹随睡。
是在作为贵族接受精英教育以前的伊丽莎白。
或者说，是如果没有被当作贵族养育起来的
伊丽莎白也说不定。

但既然并不存在那种如果，
真相究竟为何也就依然不明。

虽然必须要集齐108人，
但当108人集结起来的时候，快乐的梁山泊
也就要终结了。

接受了这一事实，九纹龙伊丽莎
开始在迦勒底从头来过，建立梁山泊。

于是，在那梁山泊中。
又加入了一位新的好汉——

于叙事诗『仙后』中登场的骑士。
是尚在修行时期的亚瑟王的友人，也是一同冒险的伙伴。
使枪的名家。
为了寻找命中注定的对手而踏上了旅途，展开了冒险。

——拥有着这样的名为布里托玛特的母亲，
并继承了她的名号的妖精骑士。
所谓第二代布里托玛特是也！
1:
身高／体重：300cm·300kg（含铠甲）
            162cm·??kg（不含铠甲）
出处：『仙后』等、Fate/Grand Order
地域：英国
属性：秩序·善　　性别：女性
身为泛人类史中的存在，侍奉着妖精女王格洛莉娅娜。
2:
高傲而率直，表里如一的女骑士。
其母称「和年轻时候的自己一模一样」。
也即是，具备那在人生中最钟情冒险与战斗的女骑士布里托玛特的精神性。
敢于直面强大，而温和对待弱小。
若是何处的某人将要失去所爱，她就会飒爽干脆地驱驰而来并将之救出苦海。
天生高傲矜持的骑士。

既爱笑，也爱哭。
为人十分感性。
3:
○贞淑的美德：A
自身为初代布里托玛特的母亲处继承而来的美德。
在与爱、贞淑或是贞节有关的冒险之中，妖精骑士布里托玛特会常时性地获得增益，华丽地进行活跃。

○妖精骑士（妖精乡）：C
显示其身为妖精女王格洛莉娅娜麾下的妖精骑士的存在方式的技能（这里所说的妖精骑士是泛人类史中的概念，同异闻带中的妖精骑士很相似但存在差别）。
原本应该具有低等级的受肉精灵技能的效果。妖精骑士布里托玛特则能汲取自然的玛纳，并一定量地自行变换为魔力。

○魔力放出（风）：B
魔力放出技能的亚种。
布里托玛特的魔力放出采用了风的形态。
使用技能时，背后会暂时显现出妖精的翅膀。
在本作中基本不会使用。
4:
在过去，女骑士布里托玛特踏上了冒险的旅途。
她与年轻的亚瑟王决斗，并与之缔结友谊；与巨人、魔术师战斗，救出少女——
最后，与命中注定的对手阿西高邂逅的布里托玛特，在众多冒险的终点，终于和他走到了一起。
之后，她与骑士亚瑟会合。
彼此齐心协力，在妖精女王格洛莉娅娜的命令下打倒了暴君“大错误（Grantorto）”。

以上，叙事诗『仙后』中讲述的女骑士布里托玛特虽然直到故事最后都是人类，但在本作中的布里托玛特还有着「在冒险之后，由妖精女王格洛莉娅娜收作妖精」的背景。

也就是说，女骑士布里托玛特在完成了所有的冒险，
变作了妖精骑士之后，与她命中注定的对手阿西高产生了爱情……
随后，诞下了命运般的爱子们。
其中一人就是奥勒留·柯那努斯。『不列颠诸王史』中记载的后来的不列颠王。
其中还有一人，名字同样是布里托玛特的。是由身为妖精的母亲生下的，天生的妖精骑士。

Penetrate Blaiddyd
从母亲处继承的，古不列颠王的魔枪。
其上附有“必定会将对手从马上击落”这样的具有强烈诅咒意味的魔术。
能和布里托玛特自己（未穿着铠甲时）的身高相当的巨大武器。

真名解放时，会将其作为魔枪的真正姿态表现出来。而持有魔枪的布里托玛特，会暂时令妖精的翅膀显现，展露出缠绕着魔风的猛烈攻势。

　　◆

『女王城塞·波涛铠壳』
阶级：C+　种类：结界宝具
有效范围：—　最大捕捉：1人

Fortless Angela
安放在母亲的娘家的城堡中的魔铠。
是与前代不列颠王乌瑟·潘德拉贡相争的撒克逊女王安吉拉在战场上披挂的名铠甲，与前文所述的魔枪一同成为了女骑士布里托玛特的装备。
一旦解放真名，可以发挥出有如人类城塞般的阵营防御能力，但在本作中基本不会进行真名解放，只表现为技能。
6:
“观星堡垒里有妖精女王摩根”。
于乐园那边听说了如此传闻的第二代布里托玛特，主动造访迦勒底，遇见了摩根。
感动无比激动不已的布里托玛特……
说道「请将自己任命为摩根陛下的外征妖精骑士」。

摩根对此给出的回答是―――
特设！　大体育运动会场！
阻挡在她面前的是数重障碍，以及将一同竞争的众多从者！
只要能克服它们就能成为外征妖精骑士，但走错一步就有可能会死！　不，一定会死！
原以为这下就算是布里托玛特也会哭丧着脸……
「是逆境吧！
　布里托玛特，燃起来了！」

顺应发展参与其中的迦勒底御主。
来吧，与干劲满满的第二代布里托玛特一起，在修炼场『明日灵血古圈（Athletic Zone）』上与对手们竞争！

　◆

……经历了诸多奋斗。
连最终难关也克服了，干得漂亮，第二代布里托玛特得到了外征妖精骑士的称号。

「非常感谢！」

露出满面笑容的布里托玛特。
就这样，她的灵基情报被刻在了迦勒底的数据库里。

A knight that appeared in the epic poem “The Faerie Queene”, a friend of King Arthur during his training days, and a companion on his adventures. A master of the spear. An adventure unfolded before her as she set out to find her destined partner.

―――That is the story of this faerie knight’s mother from which she inherited her name, the knightess Britomart. You can just consider this one to be the second-generation’s ‘Britomart’!
1:
Height/Weight: 300cm/300kg (with armor) - 162cm/??kg (without armor)

Source: “The Faerie Queen” and such, Fate/Grand Order

Region: England

Alignment: Lawful Good

She’s from Pan-Human History and serves the Faerie Queen Gloriana.
2:
A proud, upright, and direct knightess with two distinct sides. According to her mother, she looks “just like I did when I was younger”. Therefore, she carries on the spirit of Britomart, a knightess who spent a good deal of her life adventuring and doing battle.

Stand against the strong and care for the weak. If out in the world someone is about to lose their love, daringly rush in to save them. She is a proud knight by nature.


Laughing often and crying often. She’s seriously sensitive.
3:
• Virtue of Chastity: A

A virtue inherited from her mother, the original Britomart. Be it love or chastity, on adventures concerning such virtuous fidelity, the Faerie Knight Britomart will shine brilliantly with constant bonus values.


• Faerie Knight (Faerie Kingdom): C

A skill that signifies her as a Faerie Knight under the Faerie Queen Gloriana. (The concept of ‘Faerie Knight’ here is derived from Pan-Human History, and although similar to the ‘Fairy Knights’ of the Lostbelt, it is ultimately a different thing). Essentially, it has the effect of a low-ranked “Incarnated Elemental” skill. The Faerie Knight Britomart draws up mana from the earth and converts a certain amount of it into her own magical resources.


• Mana Burst (Wind): B

A subtype of the 'Mana Burst’ skill. The release of Britomart’s magical energy takes the form of wind. When this skill is activated, fairy wings temporarily form on her back. While fundamental for her, it doesn’t manifest as such in this work.
4:
Once upon a time, the Faerie Knight Britomart went on an adventure. She and the young knight Arthur formed a bond after dueling, battled against giants and magi, and even rescued a maiden―――Eventually Britomart came across her soulmate, Artegall, and soon marries him after many adventures. Afterwards, she rejoins the knight Arthur. Together, under the command of the Faerie Queen Gloriana, they overthrew the tyrant Grantorto.

The knightess Britomart described in the knightly epic 'The Faerie Queen’ was human until the end, but in this work she has the background of “After her journey, she was summoned forth as a fairy by the Faerie Queen Gloriana”.
In other words, the Faerie Knight Britomart completed her journey, was metamorphized into a Faerie Knight, found love with her destined partner Artegall, and…gave birth to her destined, beloved children. One of them being Aurelius Conanus, a later king of the Britons chronicled in the “Historia Regum Britanniae”.The other being the Britomart that inherited her name, as a natural fairy knight born from a fae mother.

出处：史实、琐罗亚斯德教、澳大利亚传说故事、Fate/stay night
地域：俄罗斯
属性：秩序·恶　　　性别：男性
真名是『言峰绮礼』。因职阶是Alterego之故，将凭依之躯的肉体名作为圣肖像登录。
混入的英灵以及神灵的名字是格里戈里·拉斯普京（或称格里高利）、阿兹·达哈卡、巴卢。
2:
○代行者：B
虽说他在代行者当中也能称得上是一流的水准，但还是比不过那些A级、超A级乃至超超A级的存在。

○洗礼秘迹：A
祈愿主的加护，治愈的祈祷。
当对象所持有的『信仰』因异教的教法而迷失前路时，令其回归正轨。此即洗礼。

○耐毒（机密）：B
妖僧拉斯普京有着对毒的耐性十分强大的传说。虽然其真假并无定论，但这位神父也有对毒的强大耐性。

○信仰的加护（独）：A+
基于信仰的肉体、精神强化。
拉斯普京当年还是一个没有必要学习读写的农民时，
就已经是一位为主的教义所倾倒，勤奋学习神之机密的人了。
凭依之躯虽是在教会按部就班学习神学的神父，
其精神性却似乎与拉斯普京有着相似的部分。
因为混合了俄罗斯正教、琐罗亚斯德教以及民间传说，发挥出了与通常的『信仰的加护』相异的效果。
不仅是对自己，对他人的肉体、精神状态也能发挥效果。这是来源于拉斯普京以皇太子阿列克谢为开端，凭借『祈祷』就治好了许多病人的传说。也有说法认为，这实际上是对药学的应用。

○恶念祝祭：A
从自身源源不绝地涌出的『恶念』的引诱。
象征着苦痛、苦恼、死亡的恶龙阿兹·达哈卡，其存在本身就是对善的威胁。而且据说因为即便击伤其身躯，也会从伤口中涌出邪恶的生物，所以就算是善神也无法消灭它。
镌刻在男人身体上的圣痕源源不断地流淌出泥一般的黑血，血又化作油燃烧，令周围盈满恶性的魔力。

○不死的巴卢：EX
月之巴卢纵使已沉入死之渊，却又重新上浮并复活。
并且从此厌恶起拒绝了自己教诲的达恩（人类），为他们定下了『死后不会再复活的命运』。
3:
■史实中的形象·人物像
格里戈里·拉斯普京是活动于俄罗斯帝国时代末期的僧侣。祈祷僧。
作为农民出身的默默无闻的僧侣，为人们讲说神学、聚集信徒，最终得到皇帝的信赖，成为与国家存亡息息相关的人物。
其传奇风采自不必提，他就这样，因种种流言蜚语以及充满了谜团的奇迹行使，在后世被冠以『妖僧』的异名而人尽皆知。

以治愈了俄罗斯皇帝尼古拉二世的嫡子、皇太子阿列克谢的疾病一事为契机，与皇帝一家的交往愈发深厚，在国政方面有了极大的发言权，因而也被贵族们疏远。
又因为他与女性信徒间奔放的交往以及他的出身，教会的司祭等人都视他为异端、不道德者并加以疏远，民众当中也有传言说他想架空皇帝以满足私欲。
虽是这般树敌众多的人生，拉斯普京却始终没有动摇自己的信仰。

虽然拉斯普京被认为是『俄罗斯帝国崩溃的原因之一』，但他却在第一次世界大战前夕，强烈主张不可与德国开战。
之后也始终坚持非战派立场的他，对于希望看到战争局面的本国和别国人士来说就成了绊脚石。
另外，拉斯普京虽然作风好色，却从不奢靡，一心过着简朴的生活。

1916年12月17日，他被忧心俄罗斯帝国未来的贵族和军部暗杀。
暗杀拉斯普京时，他明明吞服了含有氰化钾的食物却没有死去，计划不得已变更为用左轮手枪射杀。
两发子弹分别击穿了他的心脏和肺，然而他却仍未死去。于是暗杀者又接连开枪数次，才终于确认他的死亡。据说其遗体被从彼得罗夫斯基桥投入河中。
至于参与暗杀的人士究竟为何要这样处置尸体，历史记录中并没有留下理由。
4:
对于拟似从者来说，凭依之躯·英灵的任意一方均有可能占据主导，
而拉斯普京的情况则是言峰神父占据了主导地位。
这既可以说是拉斯普京和言峰神父的人性相似，或者说是他们彼此之间互相尊重其存在方式的结果，也可以认为是拉斯普京将『因以从者之身在现世复活一事而产生的意志、主张』进行了自我约束的结果。

在俄罗斯异闻带中，忧虑着阿纳斯塔西娅皇女的未来，并见证了她的结局后，英灵拉斯普京的意志便退去了。此后留下的是作为『异星之神』的使徒，被拉斯普京托付了力量的言峰神父。

『异星之神』的使徒是将复数的英灵混合在一个容器中的特殊从者。
言峰神父除了拉斯普京以外，
还加入了在琐罗亚斯德教中善恶二元论之顶点的一端，
恶神安哥拉曼纽的心腹，三头邪龙『阿兹·达哈卡』，
以及澳大利亚传说中的三犬（蛇）使，即便死去却依然在现世复活的不死月精『巴卢』的精华（Essence）。


■在某个世界中扮演的角色
魔术协会、圣堂教会这两大组织共同派遣的监督者。
二十多岁的时候，参加了由父亲担任监督者的冬木市圣杯战争。此后，被教会以『派驻』的形式转职进入魔术协会。
以第四次圣杯战争幸存者之一的身份接任了监督者一职。
拥有教会的代行者资格，十分擅长灵媒治疗。
虽然都说他喜好破坏，但绮礼和卫宫士郎一样，是“创造”一方的魔术师。他治愈灵体、精神瑕疵的技术达到了司祭的级别。
虽说不是恶徒，但本质是个恶人。虽然并非残忍无道，却属于邪魔外道。
『Fate/stay night』中最大的敌人。
5:
『零落泛滥的暗黑心脏』
阶级：A　种类：对界宝具
有效范围：无法测定　最大捕捉：无法断定

Зажигание Aŋra Mainiiu
以三头蛇，或者说是龙为触媒，给整个世界带来混乱的恶性宝具。
满溢而出的诅咒甚至拥有质量，会化作燃烧触碰者的恶念，以及其恶行累累的肉体之火焰。
针对恶属性有着伤害提升的效果，而对善属性则会发挥即死效果（微弱）。正如这一效果所展示的，
是『以邪恶之心为食粮（柴薪）燃烧世界』的事物，是若没有人类存在就无法成立的宝具。

妖僧拉斯普京、恶龙阿兹·达哈卡、嘲笑者巴卢，正是将这些各不相同的世界观一并吞噬，而在某处编纂事象中拥有着『以圣杯燃烧世界』的经历的言峰神父才会拥有的复合神性宝具。

……在某个结局中，人们坚信由自己的祈祷而生的形而上的存在是『实际存在』的，于是『神』作为穿透世界的孔得以被证明和观测。
就这样，从作为善恶二元论之究极的恶神的心脏中零落而下的污浊，如黑泥一般在地上泛滥蔓延开来。

○动机·对御主的态度
既然已经缔结契约，
就会为了御主的人生成就尽一份绵薄之力。
假如御主是恶人，那么不管在邪恶道路上走多远，他的立场也不会动摇。
若是御主想要成为善人，就会协助他走上严苛的善道，
若是御主想要成为恶人，就无怨无悔地协助他走上邪道。
6:
○性格
外向、行动派。
虽然他的思维方式、遣词造句略显悲观，却是一个足智多谋的人物。
他的身高会给人以压迫感，但其实是一位与任何人都能毫无隔阂地对话的正人君子。
他不喜欢用暴力，而更喜欢用商讨去解决问题。

深思熟虑（勤勉有加），
足智多谋（深明礼节），
有道德感（尊重社会秩序）。

○人物
将倾听他人的苦恼，并予以解决视作自己的职责。
虽然有时他会将冷静通透的态度和言辞宣之于口，但那并不是因为他轻视对方，反而是因为他在认真地对待对方。

然而。无论他多么具有圣人的资质，无论他过着怎样的人生，他的心却总是得不到满足。
知晓和平的意义，也知晓幸福的价值。
知晓对旁人予以敬意，也知晓旁人予他的尊重。
但是，他却没有『活着的实感』。
无论经过多少锻炼，无论钻研多少神学，自己都不会感到满足。

能令他满足之物并非源自善行。
人们的苦恼。留恋。争端。
只有面对这些事物时——穿行过众人恶性的泥沼，
置身于那淤塞的正中时，他的内心才感到了愉悦。
那并非是他成长过程中被培养出来的品性，而是与生俱来的圣痕。

以人们的苦恼为食粮。
因世界的阴霾而满足。
也就是说，本质上讲，对于善良的人们来说，他即是恶。

他在十多岁时了解了自己的本性，并为此苦恼。
二十多岁时对该事实予以否定，并为了克服它而投身于诸多的苦行和试炼。
然后就是现在。
在一个指导方针下，他定下了自己的人生目标。

　　　◆

表面是一位热心的宗教人士，温和的神父。
内里是一位狂热的求道者，冷静而通透的思想家。

经历了诸多的失败，诸多的挫折，诸多的结局，
那个男人找到了自己的存在方式。

“被定义为恶者诞生的意义”
“不论是怎样的生命，都应为其诞生献上祝福”

若说果真有为了成就真正之恶而降生的生命。
在其生命迎来死亡之时，
是会标榜自己的行为是『善』呢，还是会哀叹自己的行为是『恶』呢。
为了追寻，这个答案。

0: A Pseudo-Servant summoned and Servantified by the Alien God using a priest's body as the vessel. He frequently confronted Chaldea in the past taking the form of Russia's famed Mad Monk Rasputin. This man is sometimes an enemy, sometimes a neutral party, and sometimes an ally, but where do his true intentions lie?
1:
Height/Weight: 193cm / 82kg

Source: Historical fact, Zoroastrianism, Australian folklore, Fate/stay Night

Region: Russia

Alignment: Lawful Evil

Gender: Male

His True Name is Kotomine Kirei. Due to being an Alterego, his Saint Graph is registered under the flesh vessel's name.

His blended Heroic or Divine Spirits are Gregori Rasputin (also spelled Grigori), Azi Dahaka, and Bahloo.
2:
• Executor: B

He's a first-class Executor, but can't compare to the A Grades, the Super A Grades, and the Super Super A Grades.


• Baptism Sacrament: A

A healing prayer asking for the Lord's blessings. When the target's faith has been misled by other doctrines, it returns them to the proper ways. For baptism is a washing ceremony.


• Poison Resistance (Confidential): B

The Mad Monk Rasputin famously had a powerful immunity to poisons. The veracity of these accounts can't be verified, but this priest has a powerful immunity to toxins.


• Blessings of Faith (Unique): A

Body and mind strengthened by faith. Rasputin was a hard worker who devoted himself to the Lord's teachings and learned God's secrets despite his peasant birth providing him with no incentive to learn to read at the time. His vessel is a priest who studied proper theology at the Church, but his mindset shows some similarities to Rasputin's.

Since he's a mix of Russian orthodoxy, Zoroastrianism, and aboriginal folklore, his Blessings of Faith possess an effect different from the regular version of the Skill. It affects the physical and mental states of others, aside from his own. This is taken from multiple accounts of Rasputin healing illnesses with his prayers. Some suspect he was actually using pharmaceutical knowledge.


• Angra Mainyu (Malicious Feasts): A

Malicious temptation gush out of him nonstop. The mere presence of Azi Dahaka (the evil dragon symbolizing pain, agony, and death) threatens all that's good. Also, when his body is injured, it spews evil creatures from the wounds, and for that reason, not even the god of good could fell him.

Mud-like black blood pours out of the stigmas in the man's body and said blood turns to oil and burns, filling the area with malignant magical energy.


• Undying Bahloo: EX

When Bahloo the moon tried to dive into the abyss of death, it rose to the surface resurrected. And he hated the daens (humans) for rejecting his doctrine, so he dictated they were fated to never resurrect from death.
3:
• Historical figure and character

Gregori Rasputin was a monk active in the last years of Imperial Russia. The Precant. The nameless monk of peasant upbringing preached theology to the people, gathered followers, and eventually gained the Tsar's trust, making him a major figure in the state's dissolution. He was the subject of much gossip, plausible or otherwise, and later generations came to know him as the Mad Monk due to the mysterious miracles he performed.

He deepened his amity with the Russian imperial family when he saved Tsar Nikolai II's son and heir Tsarevich Alexei from illness, earning him great political influence, which caused him to be shunned by the nobility. His upbringing and uninhibited companionship with his female followers caused the orthodox clergy to disregard him as heretic and immoral, and popular rumors told that he was using the Tsar as a puppet for his interests. Rasputin lived with many enemies but never ever changed his beliefs and behaviors.


Rasputin was even considered one of the causes of Imperial Russia's collapse, but in reality, he strongly advocated for a pacific resolution to the battle against Germany shortly before World War I. He remained a pacifist afterward, making him an obstacle to the people wishing for war in both countries. Also, Rasputin was a lecher, but rather than living in luxury, he made a point to always live a frugal life.

On December 17th, 1916, he was assassinated by the military and nobility lamenting the future of Imperial Russia. During the assassination, he wouldn't die from eating a meal laced with potassium cyanide, forcing the killer to change the cause of death to a revolver shot. He still wouldn't die from 2 bullets, one to the heart and one to the lung, so after more fire, they finally confirmed his death. Afterward, they threw his body off the Petrovsky Bridge. There are no records explaining why the assassin did such a thing to the body.
4:
Pseudo-Servants take either the host or the Heroic Spirit as the main component, and in Rasputin's case, the main component is Father Kotomine. This is presumably a result of Rasputin voluntarily refraining from exposing the wills and opinions that come from being reincarnated as present-day Servant, either due to him being a man of similar character to Father Kotomine or due to their mutual respect for each other's way of life.


Rasputin was concerned about Anastasia's future in the Russian Lostbelt, so after watching her conclusion, Heroic Spirit Rasputin's will receded, leaving only Father Kotomine entrusted with Rasputin's powers to serve as an apostle of the Alien God.

The apostles of the Alien God are special Servants made from multiple Heroic Spirits mixed into a single vessel. Aside from Rasputin, Father Kotomine was also imbued with the essences of


- The three-headed wicked dragon Azi Dahaka, a confidant of one of the two pillars of Zoroastrian dualism: the evil god Angra Mainyu.


- Bahloo from Australian folklore, the immortal moon sprite who commands three dogs (snakes) and always comes back from the dead.


• In another timeline

An overseer selected by the two major organizations: the Holy Church and the Mage's Association. In his 20s, he participated in a Fuyuki Holy Grail War where his father was the overseer. After this event, he switched sides to the Mage's Association at the Church's orders. As a survivor of the Fourth Holy Grail War, he inherited the role of overseer. He was a qualified Executor and skilled in mediunic cure. It's easy to see him as someone who prefers destroying, but Kirei is a mage who "creates", exactly like Emiya Shirou. His ability to heal mental and spiritual wounds is at a Presbyter's level. He's a villain but not a wrongdoer. Fiendish but not inhuman. The greatest antagonist in Fate/stay Night.
5:
Zazhiganiye Angra Mainyu (Dark Heart that splashes into a flood)

Rank: A

Type: Anti-World Noble Phantasm

Range: Not measurable

Max. targets: Not determinable

A Malignant Noble Phantasm that uses the three-headed serpent (or dragon) as a catalyst to spread chaos onto the world. A flood of curses that gain physical mass and become flames that, upon contact, burn the bodies of those who repeatedly committed evil thoughts or deeds. Its effect deals increased damage to those of the Evil alignment and produces a (minor) insta-kill effect on the Good alignment. As the effect suggests, this Noble Phantasm is something that takes evil hearts as nourishment (firewood) to burn the world, thus it can't function without human presence.


A Composite Divinity Noble Phantasm special to Kotomine Kirei, who comprehends the rules of the different worlds of the Mad Monk Rasputin, the evil dragon Azi Dahaka, and the ridiculing Bahloo; and has a history of burning the world with the Holy Grail in some compiled event.


In one story's conclusion, the prayers of the people convinced them that metaphysical beings exist, making a god take the proven and measurable form of a gaping hole in the world. Thus, pollution spilled out of the heart of the god representing the most extreme evil in the good-evil dualism, like a flood of black mud spreading all over the lands.


Motives and attitude toward the Master


For as long as his contract is valid, he will contribute in every way he can to let his Master live a fulfilling life. Even if said Master is evil. No matter how far his Master runs into the path of evil, his stance stays the same. If they want to be good, he'll help them in the unrelenting path of good, and if they want to be evil, he'll help them in the unrepenting path of evil.
6:
• Personality

Extroverted and active. An affable man full of wit, despite his considerably pessimistic thoughts and words. He has an intimidating presence, only exacerbated by his height, but he makes a point to speak fair and impartially to all. He prefers dialogue to violent solutions.


He is thoughtful (diligent), quick-witted (well-mannered), and knows a lot about morals (values social order).


• Character

He believes his role to be listening to people's doubts and solving them. His words and actions can be sometimes cold, but he always faces their problems in earnest, never belittling them.


However, despite his saintly disposition and the life he lived because of it, his heart was never satisfied. He understood the meaning of peace and the value of happiness. He understood how to respect his neighbor and how to earn their respect. But he never felt alive. No matter how hard he trained or how much he studied theology, he never felt fulfilled.


Good deeds couldn't fulfill him. People's agony. Dying regrets. Disputes. It was only when confronting those—it was only when pushing through people's malignant mud that his heart rejoiced. This is not a property developed in his growth process, it is a stigma gained from birth.

He feeds on people's agony. The more downcast the world is, the more he is fulfilled. This means that since birth, he was what good people would consider evil.

In his teens, he figured out his nature and anguished over it. In his 20s, he rejected this fact and put himself through many trials and penances to overcome it. Through this single guiding principle, he determined the purpose of his life.


◆


On the outside, he's an amicable priest and a fervent religionist. On the inside, he's a cold thinker in a rigorous search for the truth.

Through many wounds, many setbacks, and many conclusions, the man arrived at his current state.


"What is the meaning of being born destined for evil?"

"The birth of every life must be blessed."


All to learn one answer. On the verge of its death, would a being born to do true evil scream that their deeds were good, or would they lament that their deeds or evil?

0:
断罪的具现——
仅在将通常灵基状态下也拥有的身为『忿怒的神罚执行者』的侧面突出显现的例外状况下，英灵尼托克丽丝才会以Alter灵基现界。
也即是，如同沙漠的暗夜里呼啸而过的凛冽寒风一般的存在，
尼托克丽丝·Alter。
并非是天空神荷鲁斯的化身兼统御冥府的法老，
而是冥府神阿努比斯的显现，冥界的女王兼身居高天的法老。

是在原本的人类史中无法召唤的存在。
1:
身高／体重：162cm·51kg
出处：史实
地域：埃及
属性：混沌·恶　　　性别：女性
幸运数值属于自我申告。
2:
在异灵化的基础上半神灵化，内心变得如寒冰般冷静的尼托克丽丝。
……如业火般激荡的愤怒，令她失却了许多感情，作为其结果，尼托克丽丝·Alter得到了如寒冰般的冷静。

自称断罪之法老的她的身姿没有丝毫迷茫。
面对其他法老系英灵也毫不畏缩的威风凛凛的姿态，会让人联想到没有自尽并以统治者的身份走向明天的，那种「如果」当中的法老·尼托克丽丝。

Alter灵基成立之际，神灵阿努比斯为尼托克丽丝赐下了诸多的加护与祝福。
虽未能形成神核，但拥有规格外的神灵适应性的尼托克丽丝·Alter具备能够匹敌神灵的魔力。

……之所以没能成为具备神核的，阿努比斯神的分灵灵基而是就这样现界，或许是因为古埃及第六王朝的诸位法老的意愿。
3:
○狂化：E
尼托克丽丝·Alter虽具有疯狂的性质，但仍充分保持着至少能如传说所述一般将计划性的犯罪顺利实施的理性。
在理性和语言能力上没有欠缺，但对状态数值的提升效果就很微薄。
原本应该是Berserker的职阶技能。
英灵尼托克丽丝是无论恩仇的复仇者，原本是不能够被以Avenger职阶召唤的。不过，仅在这因为某个特殊理由才成立的Alter灵基的情况下，尼托克丽丝才会破例地以保有Berserker职阶技能的特殊Avenger的形式被召唤。
4:
○冥府神的裁定：A
冥府神阿努比斯的权能部分地技能化的产物。
据『死者之书』记载，阿努比斯神会称量死者的心脏，据此判断其生前的功过。
（相比真正的权能而言阶级有所降低，因此就算加以运用也不会破坏灵核）

○沙漠的晚风：A
由皇帝特权变化而来的技能。
如同夜晚的沙漠里呼啸着的凛冽寒风一般，尼托克丽丝·Alter能够支配夜之领域。
5:
『吾之美丽冥府，开辟道路吧』
阶级：A　种类：对人/对军宝具
有效范围：1~60　最大捕捉：1人/200人

Neferu Su-en Anubis
作为冥府神的地上显现，
尼托克丽丝全力以赴的解放。

令身为冥府之神、死神本尊的阿努比斯神的巨大分灵暂时现界，为地上带来冷酷无情的裁定与断罪（是比通常灵基状态下宝具真名解放时，以『冥镜宝典』的守护者现身的阿努比斯像更为强力的分灵）。

真名解放时，会有和使用沙漠的晚风技能时相同的神圣文字浮现而出。
或许那便是，祈愿尼托克丽丝的灵魂不会被阿努比斯神与冥府的威势完全吞噬的，古埃及第六王朝的历代法老们的加护也说不定。
6:
在原本的人类史中无法召唤的存在。
想要通过圣杯战争或是迦勒底的召唤式将其召唤，原本是不可能的。若非在南美异闻带结下缘分的缘故，是不会被召唤到迦勒底的吧。

在南美异闻带中，为了对抗卡马索茨，尼托克丽丝通过自戕也即献上心脏的方式，变质、派生为了「没能救下兄弟们的罪孽自不必说，将逆臣们屠尽的罪孽也无疑应当背负，为了偿还这些罪孽而自杀」的尼托克丽丝，化作了身为冥界女王的异灵（Alter）灵基——复仇者，Avenger。

0:
The Embodiment of Judgment



Even in her regular Saint Graph, Heroic Spirit Nitocris holds the facet of the "Fearsome Arbitrator of Divine Punishment" within herself, and when this manifests exceptionally strongly in her, she takes the form of this Alter Saint Graph
Namely, the one akin to the freezing winds of the desert night: Nitocris Alter.



Rather than the Pharaoh who rules the netherworld despite being the incarnation of Sky God Horus, she is now the Pharaoh who inhabits the sky despite being the Queen of the Underworld, and the manifestation of Netherworld God Anubis.



She is impossible to summon in ordinary human history.
1:
Height/Weight: 162 cm / 51 kg

Source: Historical fact

Region: Egypt

Alignment: Chaotic Evil

Gender: Woman

Her LCK stat is self-reported.
2:
On top of her Alteration, Nitocris has also become half Divine Spirit, and her heart is now calm as ice.

The intensity of Nitocris' hellfire-like fury has made her lose most of her emotions, and thus she acquired this calmness akin to ice.


No doubt can be observed in the Pharaoh who wears the name of judgment.

Her dignified form, which wavers not even in front of the other Egyptian Heroic Spirits, brings to mind a Pharaoh Nitocris who faced her tomorrow as a ruler instead of taking her own life.


With the formation of her Alter Saint Graph, Divine Spirit Anubis granted Nitocris vast divine protection.

While she hasn't formed a Divine Core, Nitocris Alter's anomalously high Divine Spirit Aptitude means she possesses magical energy on par with that of Divine Spirit Servants.


The reason her Saint Graph hasn't become an Aspect of Anubis with a Divine Core is possibly because the Pharaohs from the Sixth Dynasty of Egypt wished her not to...
3:
Mad Enhancement: E

Nitocris Alter does hold madness within her, but possesses more than enough reason to carry through with the same kind of premeditated crimes as the ones from her legend.

This Skill causes no defect in her ability to reason or communicate, and the effect it has on her stats is extremely minimal.


Ordinarily this is the Class Skill of Berserkers.

Heroic Spirit Nitocris is an avenger without vengefulness, and would ordinarily never be summoned as a genuine Avenger. However, if for some peculiar reason there was a situation in which she was established with an Alter Saint Graph, Nitocris would be able to be summoned as a unique Avenger possessing the Class Skills of a Berserker, but only then.
4:
Arbitration from the Underworld Goddess: A

A portion of Netherworld God Anubis' Authority made into a Skill.

According to the Book of the Dead, Anubis would measure the hearts of the dead, and arbitrate them depending on their deeds in life.

(Due to it being ranked down compared to Anubis' regular Authority, using it will not destroy her Spiritual Core)


Breeze During the Night in the Desert: A

A variant on the Imperial Privilege Skill.

As the one akin to the fiercely blowing and freezing winds of the desert night, Nitocris rules the domain of the night.
5:
"My Beautiful Netherworld, Open your Passage"

Rank: A

Type: Anti-Personnel/Anti-Army Noble Phantasm


Range: 1-60


Maximum Targets: 1/200


Neferu Suen Anubis

The full might unleashed by Nitocris in her capacity as the earthly manifestation of the Netherworld God.


Nitocris manifests as a gigantic Aspect of Anubis, the God of the Netherworld and the Dead himself, bringing merciless arbitration and judgment upon the world (This Aspect is far more powerful than the Anubis statue that appears as the guardian of Anpu Neb Ta Djeser when Nitocris unleashes her true name in her regular Saint Graph).


When unleashing her true name, the same sacred letters as the ones from when she uses her Wind of the Desert Night Skill emerges.


These are perhaps the protection of the long line of Pharaohs from the Sixth Dynasty of Egypt who wish for the entirety of Nitocris' soul to not be consumed by the might of Anubis and his netherworld.
6:
An existence ordinarily not summonable in Pan-Human History.

Be it through the Holy Grail War or Chaldea's Summoning System, she is ordinarily impossible to summon.

Were it not for the bonds forged with her in the South American Lostbelt, she surely wouldn't have been summoned to Chaldea.


In order to confront Camazotz in the South American Lostbelt, Nitocris took her own life by offering up her heart, and by doing so, instead of the Nitocris who took suicide as repentance for the sin of being unable to save her brothers as well as killing her retainers, she morphed into the Alter Saint Graph of the Queen of the Underworld, becoming an Avenger.

0:
阿兹特克的世界中，地上最为强大的神明。
战斗与魔术，美与不和，夜与支配，风暴与疫病，犯罪与规则，幸运与不幸，他所司掌的正是在常理之下正反对立的两面，以及由其中的矛盾冲突而生的跃动。

啊啊，伟大的全能者（Moyocoyani），
令人畏怖的天地之主（Ilhuicahua Tlalticpaque）啊。
您的名是特斯卡特利波卡。
乃是映照万象的，黑色太阳的化身。
1:
身高／体重：180cm·80kg
出处：阿兹特克神话
地域：中南美
属性：混沌·善　　　性别：男性

○动机·对御主的态度
若是眼前存在生存竞争的情况，他会很乐意参战。
只不过，他不会对御主表示敬意，也不会将其视为特别的存在。
「不需要英雄。我想要的只有战士。
　只有不论何人都是战士的世界而已。」

○神话中的特斯卡特利波卡
广为世界所知的形象是异形的邪神，或是以豹的姿态现身的残忍而变化无常，喜好流血的恶神。
但在原典当中，他是力量的化身，是为了协助人们构建他们拼尽全力生存下去的场所的，以年轻而伶俐的男性姿态现身的伟大神明。
——此外，他还有着为了陷害托尔特克的宰相魏玛克（Huemac）而化身为美貌女性的轶事，以及为了算计魁札尔·科亚特尔而化身为老头儿和蜘蛛的传说。
2:
在阿兹特克的世界中被定义为地上全能之神，某种意义上说像是将北欧的奥丁、希腊的宙斯、佛教中的第六天魔王（魔罗）和基督教中的撒旦（路西法）混在了一起一般的存在。
这些神（魔性）不管哪位都是在物理层面的世界无可匹敌的存在，但在由命运衍化的灵性层面的世界中就称不上无敌了，在“虽然全能但也存在局限”这一点上也十分相似。

在日本唯独名号传得响亮，但实际上特斯卡特利波卡的神话故事少得惊人。
不仅没有如希腊神话那般「人性化」的性格，
连如日本神话那般「传承在后世人类社会中的痕迹」都没有。
一定要说的话，特斯卡特利波卡是系统性质的存在，是能够引发此世一切场所都必然存在的纷争，并决定其结果的……这样的神。

但决定纷争结果的行为并不存在一个明确的标准，特斯卡特利波卡本身也不会干涉这个决定。说到底只是摇动骰子罢了。
这一点与诸多神话中登场的命运之神都无法以自己的意志操纵命运本身的情况也很相似。
3:
如果是认同了自身力量之人，无论如何都会给予援助，但如果是只想测试自己有多少力量的人，也会赐下让人觉得生不如死的严酷试炼。
与之相对，为了给渴求力量之人挑战自己的机会，有时也会在黑暗中不带护卫独自行走，据说此时挑战特斯卡特利波卡并得胜者，就能获得那无上的援助。
——而且据说每当这个时候，特斯卡特利波卡都会为了让人能认出自己，特意穿着如王般铺张豪华的军装出行，遇到挑战的话则会不用武器只靠搏杀一决胜负。
并且特斯卡特利波卡（无论此时的他是怎样的人格）绝不会毁约。

　　◆

完全不会听取对手的意见，残忍冷酷的战神，黑之特斯卡特利波卡。
只要是拥有战斗的意志者，不论是谁都能够与之平等对话的火与未来之神，赤之特斯卡特利波卡。
守护都市，认同休憩的必要性，最喜欢捉弄魁札尔·科亚特尔的乐园之神，青之特斯卡特利波卡。

会毫无缘由地在以上三种倾向间切换，是非常令人困扰的神格。
4:
○性格
外向、主动。
十分完美主义，而且相当会挖苦人。不用说当然也很好战。
说话（讲谈）时有口癖，有着会把对于对手而言必要的事情（有欠缺的地方）以闲谈的形式加以忠告的习惯。
对他人要求严苛。而对自己就很宽容（不如说，因为自己的性质随时随地都会改变，也没法对自己要求严格）。
因为本质上是悲观主义者，会让周围的空气变得沉重，又因为天生运气不好（会招致愈发严峻的境况），被当作死神对待。
虽然性格冷淡、冷酷，但从爱说话的角度来讲，还挺容易喜欢上别人（讨别人喜欢）的。

「起初会是最差的情况。要承受住。坚持并战胜它。
　那之后便会有好事发生了。不过好坏相抵之后，剩的也不多就是了」

不断地寻找着「争斗的种子」，并期盼着它的成长和萌发的残酷人格。
其存在方式，就像是同时给两个都市国家提供武器，对双方挑起战争翘首以盼的军火贩子一样。
那其中并不存在恶意，对特斯卡特利波卡而言，生存竞争便是秩序……他将这视为令世界安定运转的善。

中意19世纪~21世纪的战争，将到2018年为止的近代兵器（个人武装）视作「不错的玩具」而爱不释手。
（也是在评判阿兹特克帝国最终败给了征服者们的枪炮一事）
但用起来的手法却很烂。结果最后还是以野蛮的手斧、豹化的爪子以及超自然现象为武器战斗。本人如果被指出这一点就会很受伤。
「我倒是不讨厌日本人。你们在迂回曲折这方面登峰造极啊。
『正因为是中意的事情才会变得擅长』什么的，哪儿还有这么残忍的说法啊？」
5:
○战士之司：A
Titlacauan。
意为『司役我等如奴仆者』。
会强迫契约者进行悍不畏死的战斗。与特斯卡特利波卡缔结契约者不得自然死亡，必须要在战斗中结束自己的生命。
作为这般严苛的契约的代价，契约者会被赋予超越自身极限的活力。
能够提升御主的能力。

○斗争的魅力：A
如同魁札尔·科亚特尔拥有培育生命体之『善性』『作为』，使之奋进的领袖魅力，作为其对手的特斯卡特利波卡也拥有能够煽动生命体的领袖魅力。
是令『恶性』『斗争』沸腾起来的进攻性质的领袖魅力。
对受了致命伤却仍要战斗，或者说即便死去也想战斗下去的战士，特斯卡特利波卡会给予优待。

○黑色太阳：EX
黑曜石上所映出的太阳。知晓未来，并操纵万象之流转，乃是全能之神的权能。
虽然无法操纵“此世不存之物”，但只要是“此世存在之物”，就能随心所欲地加以组合替换。
比如说，假设存在有『先获胜，后战败的王国』，他就能做到变换事情发生的顺序，将其变为『先失败，而后获胜的王国』，使事情的结论发生改变。
只不过，太过于违反常理的操作也会使特斯卡特利波卡本人受到惩罚。
当他右脚的黑曜石不再映照出太阳的时候，特斯卡特利波卡就会失去神格，变为纯粹的“人类”。

○山之心脏：A
Tepeyollotl。是表示身为群豹之王的名号，也是巨大的豹子的名字。
既是在神话中，击碎了身化太阳的魁札尔·科亚特尔的腰骨并将其击坠在地，将充斥世间的巨人全部捕食杀害的特斯卡特利波卡的豹形态，同时也是他投射在外的灵魂的一部分。
6:
『第一太阳纪』
阶级：B　种类：对界宝具
有效范围：0~999　最大捕捉：999人

First Sun Xibalba
本来正确的真名应当是『Nahui Ocelotl』或者『Mictlan Xibalba』，但沾染了现代气息的特斯卡特利波卡将它改成了这样。
身为与玛雅神话的冥界西巴尔巴被视为同一存在的地下冥界米克特兰、休憩之乐园米克特兰帕的支配者的特斯卡特利波卡的权能，与他作为太阳居于高天的第一太阳纪（Nahui Ocelotl）时的力量相融合的产物。
能够支配地上的一切物理法则，使万物服从于自己所规定的常理，但同时自身也会被这份常理所束缚。
——因为那已经灭尽的巨人们阔步前行的第一太阳纪，只有冥界还残留着其痕迹，所以要取回其中的力量，或者要让其重现于地上，必然也就等同于令冥界本身出现在地上。

　　◆

中南美是一片过于严酷的土地，据推测，那里的人们曾经数次迎来浩劫。
因此，人们会对并非在现今的世界中最开始就存在的世界，而是存在于自己之前的、曾经的世界中的事物抱有强烈的信仰。
反过来说，哪怕世界会毁灭，某种因子也必然会存续下来，并继承到下一个世界。他们坚信着世界即便毁灭，也会再度复生。
这一信仰最为突出的表现就是『五个太阳纪』，是世界毁灭五次的传说。
特斯卡特利波卡司掌了这五次当中的第一次，并且与司掌着最后的第五次的魁札尔·科亚特尔进行了对话，世界由此再生，安定为了现在的阿兹特克神话世界。

尽管特斯卡特利波卡被误解为『死与战争之神』，但其实阿兹特克神话中的神明几乎都是死神。
所以说，特斯卡特利波卡并非是特别要「杀害人类，活祭心脏，威胁世界」的存在。
倒不如说，他才是守护中南美世界的规则（活祭的重要性。正因为献上了重要之物，世界才得以安定）一侧的神明，而威胁世界（视活祭为不必要之物，想要破坏既有规则）的则是魁札尔·科亚特尔这边。

0:
The most powerful deity on Earth within the Aztec world.

He presides over battle and magecraft, beauty and discord, night and governance, storms and plagues, crimes and rules, fortune both fair and foul, natural laws and clashes between people, and thus, the lively motions brought forth by such things clashing.


Oh, grand Moyocoyani, dreadful Ilhuicahua Tlalticpaque.

Thy name is Tezcatlipoca.

The incarnation of the black Sun, who reflects all creation.
1:
Height/Weight: 180 cm / 80 kg

Source: Aztec Mythology

Region: Latin America

Attribute: Chaotic Good

Gender: Male


• Motive and Attitude towards his Master

Where a struggle for existence exists, he will gladly participate.

However, he will not evaluate his Master with respect, nor will he observe them as special.

“I don’t want a hero. I only desire warriors.

Nothing more than a world where everyone is a warrior.”


• Mythological Tezcatlipoca

The impression known around the world is that of a wicked, grotesque god, or a cruel, bloodthirsty, capricious, and evil god in the shape of a jaguar.

However, in the original texts, he was the incarnation of power, a magnificent god in the form of a clever young man who aids the people in constructing a place in which to live, where they can achieve their full potential.

――― But still, there is the incident in which he shapeshifted into an attractive woman to ensnare Minister Huemac of the Toltec, as well as the legends of him transforming into an old man or a spider to trap Quetzalcoatl.
2:
As he was defined as the omnipotent deity on Earth within the Aztec world, his existence is, in a certain sense of the word, a mixture between Odin of the Norselands, Zeus of Greece, the Buddhist Demon King of the Sixth Heaven (Mara), and the Satan of Christianity (Lucifer).

These gods (devils) are all peerless existences in the physical world, but in the more spiritual world of destiny, they are not so unrivalled, and are similar in that they are all limited despite their omnipotence.


In Japan, where he is preceded by name alone, there are surprisingly few mythological accounts of Tezcatlipoca.

There is no human-like nature like there is in Greek mythology, nor is there even a trace of “the subsequent human society” like in Japanese mythology.

Tezcatlipoca appears to instead be a systemic existence, like a god who can… exist in any location on this world, cause strife, and then decide the outcome of these conflicts.


However, the standards for determining these outcomes are unclear, and Tezcatlipoca himself doesn’t seem to take part in the decision-making. He just rolls the dice.

This is similar to the fact that, in many myths, gods of destiny cannot control fate itself by their own will.
3:
He will give aid to any who recognise his power, but to test the extent of his own power, he will sometimes impose trials so severe that an ordinary person may even think themselves lucky if they die.

On the other hand, in order to give those who desire power the chance to challenge him, he will at times walk into the dark of the night unescorted, and it is said that whosoever challenges Tezcatlipoca at that time and wins will receive his supreme support.

――― On top of that, when he did so, he would go out dressed like a king, wearing extravagant war garb that would ensure anyone who saw him would understand he was Tezcatlipoca, and if challenged to a fight, he would fight unarmed, attaining victory or defeat through wrestling. And Tezcatlipoca (no matter his personality at the time) would never break a promise.


◆


The cold-blooded and ruthless god of war, who will never heed the opinions of others, Black Tezcatlipoca.

The god of both flame and the future, who will speak as an equal to any who have the will to fight, Red Tezcatlipoca.

The god of paradise, who safeguards the city, approves of rest, and has a great fondness for teasing Quetzalcoatl, Blue Tezcatlipoca.

He’s an unmanageable deity whose three courses of action change without any particular reason.
4:
• Personality

Diplomatic and active.

A perfectionist, and also somewhat sarcastic. Naturally belligerent.

He has a habit of chattering (narrating), and of advising others of what they need (or what they lack) while chatting.

Harsh towards other people. Tolerant of himself (or better said, his nature changes on the spot, so he can’t be harsh on himself).

He is a pessimist at his core, so he makes the atmosphere heavy wherever he goes, and his inherent lack of luck (which invites even more difficult situations) earns him the treatment of a god of death.

His disposition is heartless and cruel, but his talkative side makes it easy for him to like (and be liked by) people.


“The worst comes first. Endure it, then win the second round.

Good things await on the other side. Well, after some deductions, it’ll only be a little, but still.”


He is a terrible personality who is always searching for the seeds of war, which he will look forward to watching as they grow and sprout.

His way of being seems like that of an arms dealer, who seeks to incite a war that would happen either way, and so delivers weapons to two city-states.

He has no malice in doing so, for to Tezcatlipoca’s perspective, the struggle for existence itself is order… a good that brings stability to the world.

He is fond of the wars from the 19th through 21st centuries, and appreciates modern weaponry (personal weapons) as “nice toys”.


(He also acknowledges the defeat of the Aztec Empire at the guns of the Conquistadors.)

However, he has no talent in using them. At the end of the day, he ends up fighting with savage axes, jaguarised claws, and supernatural phenomena as his weapons. He gets very hurt when people point this out to him.

“Well now, I don’t hate the Japanese. You guys are just horribly indirect. ‘If you do what you like, you’ll be good at it’? Is there any other expression nearly as cruel?”
5:
• Titlacauan: Lord of Warriors: A

Titlacauan.

It means “we are his slaves”.

He forces his contractor to fight without a fear of death. Those who contract with Tezcatlipoca are not permitted to die of natural causes, but must instead end their lives in battle.

As compensation for such a harsh covenant, he will confer vital energy to his contractor that exceeds their own limits. Improves Master Skill functionality.


• Charisma of Conflict: A

Just as Quetzalcoatl has the Charisma to rouse and inspire “goodness” and “activity” in lifeforms, her rival, Tezcatlipoca, holds the Charisma to incite lifeforms.

An aggressive Charisma that excites “malignance” and “conflict”.

Tezcatlipoca gives favourable treatment to those warriors who are mortally wounded, yet seek to fight on, or those who have died and still try to fight.


• Black Sun: EX

The Sun reflected in obsidian. The omnipotent deity’s Authority to see the future, and to manage the flow of all things.

“Things not in this world” cannot be manipulated, but things “that exist in this world” are able to be rearranged at will.

For example, if there was “a kingdom that will triumph, then be defeated”, it would be possible to change the order of events, and thus the conclusion, to “a kingdom that will be defeated, then triumph”.

However, if his manipulations go too far against the natural order, Tezcatlipoca himself will be penalised.

When the sun no longer reflects off his obsidian right leg, Tezcatlipoca will lose his Divinity, and will become a normal human.


• Tepeyollotl: Heart of the Mountains: A

Tepeyollotl. A name signifying the king of the jaguars, and also the name of a giant jaguar.

In mythology, it is the exterior projection of one part of his soul, Tezcatlipoca’s jaguar form, which killed and devoured the giants who filled the Earth, and which crushed the hip-bones of Quetzalcoatl, who had become the Sun, causing them to fall to the ground.
6:
『The First Sun』

Rank: B

Type: Anti-World Noble Phantasm

Range: 0~999

Maximum Targets: 999 people


First Sun Xibalba.

Originally, “Nahui Ocelotl” or “Mictlan Xibalba” would be correct, but this is Tezcatlipoca's style, in his modern day-obsessed state.

A fusion of the power of the age of the First Sun (Nahui Ocelotl) when he was the Sun in the skies, with his Authority as the ruler of Mictlampa, the paradise of rest, which is the subterranean underworld Mictlan, further identified as being the same as the underworld of Mayan mythology, Xibalba.

He rules over all the physical laws of this world, and all things must obey the natural laws as he decides they are, but he too is bound by the influence of his own divine providence.

――― Since the age of the First Sun, in which the now-perished giants roamed freely, left its traces behind only in the underworld, recovering that power, or otherwise making it appear in this world, is necessarily equivalent to the underworld itself coming into existence in the world.


◆


Latin America is a harsh region, and it is speculated that mankind suffered many catastrophes there.

This led to a strong belief among people that the present world was not the one that existed from the beginning, but that a world had once existed before them.

By contrast, even if this world falls to ruin, some factor will always remain, and will be passed onward to the next world. It was their strong belief that, even if the world perished, it would always be revived.

The strongest expression of this belief was the legend of the Five Suns, the myth of the five times the world was destroyed.

Tezcatlipoca ruled over the first of the five, and at the last of the five, he spoke with Quetzalcoatl, regenerated the world, and stabilised the present world of Aztec mythology.


Tezcatlipoca is often misunderstood as a “god of war and death”, but most Aztec gods were gods of death.

So, Tezcatlipoca “killing humans, accepting the hearts of living sacrifices, and threatening the world” was nothing special.

Rather, he was a god on the side of protecting the rule of the Latin American world (living sacrifices are important. The world is stable because of the sacrifice of important things) and even Quetzalcoatl (who tried to break the existing rule that living sacrifice is important) threatened the world.

以特拉洛克神，以及威齐洛波契特里神的名号自称的谜之从者。
特拉洛克是阿兹特克神话中的雨神，拥有着支配了创世神话中第三太阳纪的世界，并最终将之以火雨毁灭的传说。
威齐洛波契特里则是阿兹特克民众的部族神，被认为是战神和太阳的化身。
1:
身高／体重：168cm·55kg
出处：阿兹特克文明、中南美神话
地域：中南美
属性：秩序·善　　　性别：女性
「侍奉神明的都市，必须做到强大与美丽兼备。
　“只要住惯了哪儿都一样”之类的话，可不要
　在我的跟前说出口，好吗？」
2:
○性格
内向、主动。
坚信自己的正确性，并将之贯彻到底的钢铁优等生。
所谓正义即是「都市的繁荣」「都市的安全」，
所谓邪恶即是「都市的衰退」「都市的危险」。
面对贯彻正义者虽然不会
一边夸奖一边露出微笑，但会有所优待。
面对施行邪恶者也不会
一边呵斥一边表达鄙视，但会实施处刑。

『战斗不问本质和价值。无论是出于什么样的理由才战斗的都无所谓。战斗，而后迎接死亡，这就是全部。』

与这样主张的特斯卡特利波卡其实完全合不来，但因为敬爱特斯卡特利波卡的缘故，在这一点上会有所忍耐。

冷静、冷酷的冷美人。
……本人虽然如此评价自己，但说话时的句尾还是会如实表露她当下的情感。
表示深刻的爱情或执着时是「……，好吗？」，
表示失望或怜悯时是「……，好吗？」，
表示敌意或愤怒时是「……，好吗？」，
以上，虽然乍一看都一样，但个中意味存在各式各样的变化。因为身为雨之神的缘故，总而言之湿度很不得了。
3:
自称为雨神特拉洛克和战神威齐洛波契特里，称呼特斯卡特里波卡为兄长大人的少女模样的从者。
其真实身份是寄宿在都市里的精灵，是将都市拟人化的从者。
她的名字是特诺奇蒂特兰（Tenochtitlan）。
存在于14到16世纪的，阿兹特克帝国的首都。
特诺奇蒂特兰虽然位于水上，却有30万居民，城市里没有一个农民，只有国王、祭司、贵族、商人和奴隶，是当时最新、最大的城市模本。

据说后来灭亡阿兹特克帝国的征服者埃尔南·科尔特斯及其一行人在来到特诺奇蒂特兰时也惊叹道「世界上从未有过这样的城市」。
现在，它的痕迹已经完全消失，变成了墨西哥的首都墨西哥城。
4:
○阵地建造：EX
身为都市拟人化的存在的特诺奇蒂特兰的阵地建造乃是最高阶级。

○神性：A+
因为同时持有两柱神性，阶级很高。

○水边作业：A+
作为水上都市最高峰的矜持与骄傲。

○都市国家同盟：A
阿兹特克帝国，即是特诺奇蒂特兰、特斯科科、特拉科潘三座都市的同盟所形成的共同体。

○第三太阳纪：A
能够创造雨神特拉洛克所支配的世界，第三太阳纪（Nahui Quiahuitl）。

○花之战争：A
Xochiyaoyotl。即“荣冠战争”或“华丽战争”。都市国家的存续，离不开与其它部族间的战争，以及奴隶的获得。
在特诺奇蒂特兰的神殿中被剜出心脏的活祭们的血迹蔓延，而据说这份活力会令他们的世界（太阳）得享守护。

○月之湖：EX
Metztliapan。流浪的阿兹特克人们最终抵达的安居之地，后来在其上建起特诺奇蒂特兰的湖的名字。
为人类带来安息与繁荣的“人理”收束点。可以说是能量场（Power Spot）。
存在于地上，同时又拥有与星之内海一致的灵脉。
能给予队伍全体高额的物理伤害减免，特诺奇蒂特兰自身则会得到超幅强化。
5:
『重启动心脏都市』
阶级：D　种类：对军宝具
有效范围：1~40　最大捕捉：100人

Ometeotl Tenochtitlan
水上都市特诺奇蒂特兰，可不仅仅是都市那么简单。
它是将部族神威齐洛波契特里的魂灵作为骨架。
将带来雨水与干旱的神明特拉洛克的魂灵作为外皮。
将堆积起来的巨石作为肌肉。
以及，将活祭们流下的鲜血作为运输管道，由此启动的巨大兵器……！

也就是都市型巨大机器人。高30~50米。
（内置操作席，搭载特诺奇蒂特兰）
将都市驱动起来，姑且是勉强模仿出特诺奇蒂特兰的姿态，并将供奉二柱神明的神殿变形为长枪，粘在一起作为武器使用。
其心口存有过去特诺奇蒂特兰里流淌的，并未流失而是贮藏起来了的活祭们的鲜血，以此作为魔力资源使用，能释放超高温的热射线。
6:
因为是都市之魂，基本上来说是喜爱人类的。
但那究竟是，将人视作一种动物来爱呢，
还是将之作为给身为都市的自己增光添彩的一部分来爱呢，这一点尚且不明（或许两者皆有）。

对于中意的对象，她会委婉而自然地，但从旁来说怎么看怎么露骨地提议让人住在特诺奇蒂特兰。
「我调查了一番你的家。
　虽然并没有很担心你啦，但在那种水准的城市里居住的话，你的人生也会滑向低谷了哦？
　要我说就该搬家，好吗？」

　　◆

虽然是慵懒系冷美人，但十分我行我素，也不怎么烦恼，性情十分直爽。如果怒气值超出了上限，就会完全没有优等生样子地破口大骂。这种情况意外地多。

在其内心中，有着身为『毁灭了的都市』的郁结。
因蒙特祖马二世的选择，阿兹特克帝国迎来了毁灭，特诺奇蒂特兰也消失在了地上。
她所期望的事物，既非阿兹特克的复苏，亦非特诺奇蒂特兰的重建。
只是，如果能再度，作为一座都市存在的话。
不论那是怎样渺小的世界也好，这次一定要，守护好居住在都市里的生命，她如此强烈地祈愿着。

A mysterious Servant who refers to herself as both the god Tlaloc and the god Huitzilopochtli.

Tlaloc was the Aztec god of rain, who ruled the third world as the Sun but destroyed it via a rain of fire, according to legend.

Huitzilopochtli was the tribal god of the Aztec people, known both as a war god and the incarnation of the sun.
1:
Height/Weight: 168 cm/55 kg

Source: Aztec civilization, Latin American mythology

Region: Latin America

Alignment: Lawful Good

Gender: Female


“A city dedicated to the gods must be both strong and beautiful. Please don’t say such phrases like ‘home is where you make it’ around me, okay?”
2:
• Personality

Introverted yet dynamic.

An iron honor student who believes in her own righteousness and thoroughly abides by it.

Justice is “urban prosperity” and “urban safety”; evil is “urban decay” and “urban danger.

Those who live righteously are not especially praised or laughed at, but favored; those who live wickedly are not especially scolded or looked down upon, but executed.


"The value or the quality of the battle is irrelevant. Fight for whatever reason you please. Fighting and dying is all that matter.”


The one who professes such things, Tezcatlipoca, is one who she doesn’t really get along with. But as she respects Tezcatlipoca, she’s able to put up with it.


A calm and ruthless ‘cool beauty’.

She carefully evaluates what she says, but her emotions at the time are clearly expressed at the end of her sentences.

Expressing deep affection or attachment: “…Okay?”

Expressing disappointment or pity: “…Okay?”

Expressing hostility or anger: “…Okay?”

Even if it seems to be similar at first, they have different meanings. Perhaps because she’s a rain god, her level of 'humidity’ is amazing.
3:
A Servant in the form of a young woman who calls herself Tlaloc, the god of rain, Huitzilopochtli, the god of war, and refers to Tezcatlipoca as her brother.

Their true identity is a spirit that resided within their city, a Servant that personified the city itself.

Its name is Tenochtitlan.

The capital of the Aztec Empire, which existed from the 14th to 16th centuries.

Although Tenochtitlan was located on the water, it was the newest and largest urban model of its time, with 300,000 inhabitants and not a single peasant in the city, but only the king, priests, nobles, merchants, and slaves.


Hernán Cortés, the conquistador who would later destroy the Aztec empire, and his traveling party were said to have marveled when they visited Tenochtitlan, saying: “There is no city like this in the entire world”.

Today, traces of it have been completely lost and it has become Mexico City, the capital of Mexico.
4:
Territory Creation: EX

The personification of a city, Tenochtitlan’s 'Territory Creation’ is of the highest rank.


Divinity: A+

Due to possessing two divinities, it is exceptionally high.


Waterside Performance: A+

Dignity and pride in being a premier waterfront city.


City-State Alliance: A

The Aztec Empire was a tribal alliance of Tenochtitlan, Texcoco, and Tlacopan.


Nahui Quiahuitl: The Third Sun: A

Created a world under Third Sun (Nahui Quiahuitl), ruled by Tlaloc, the god of rain.


Xochiyaóyotl: Flower War: A

Xochiyaoyotl. Wars with other tribes and the acquisition of slaves were essential to the survival of the city-state.

It is said that the temple of Tenochtitlan is said to have been marked by a trail of blood from the sacrifices whose hearts were removed, and their world (the sun) was protected by their vitality.


Metztliapan: Lake Texcoco: EX

Meztliapan. The name of the lake where the wandering Aztecs found a safe haven and where Tenochtitlan was later built.

A convergence point of “humanity” that brings rest and prosperity to mankind. It’s like a ‘power spot’.

Despite being on the ground, it has the same spiritual leylines as the Inner Sea of the Planet.

It adds a high damage cut to the entire party, and Tenochtitlan herself is super-powered.
5:
Activate the Great Heart of the City

Rank: D

Type: Anti-Army Noble Phantasm

Range: 1-40

Maximum capture: 100 people


Ometeotl Tenochtitlan.

The waterside city of Tenochtitlan is more than just a city.

Its skeleton of the soul of the tribal god Huitzilopochtli.

The outer shell is the soul of Tlaloc, the god of rain and drought.

Muscles made of piled megaliths.

A massive latent weapon that’s activated using the blood of sacrifices as a pipeline…!


A giant metropolitan robot. 30-50 meters tall.

(Tenochtitlan is on board in the cockpit.)

The city rises, somewhat taking the shape of Tenochtitlan, and the temple dedicated to the two gods is transformed into a long spear as it attaches together, turning into a weapon.

The blood of sacrifices once shed in Tenochtitlan is stored in the chest without spilling, and she uses it as a magical resource, releasing incredibly hot rays of energy.
6:
Being the soul of a city, she does like people.

It’s unclear whether she loves humans as animals, or as elements that color her urban vibrancy (most likely both).

She proposes to let the person he likes live in Tenochtitlan in a natural and apparently blunt manner.


“I looked into your home.

I’m not particularly concerned, but if you continue to live in a place of that caliber, your quality of life will go down.

You should move, okay?”


　◆


She’s an 'ennui’-type 'cool beauty’, who sincerely and openly marches at her own pace. However, when her anger reaches a boiling point, she swears in a manner unbefitting of her 'honor student’ appearance. A lot.

Inside, there’s the pent up feeling of being a 'destroyed city’.

Due to the choices of Montezuma II, the Aztec empire was destroyed and Tenochtitlan disappeared from the earth.

What she wants is not the revival of the Aztecs or the rebuilding of Tenochtitlan.

Simply the chance to exist as a city once more.

No matter how small her world may be, she has a strong desire to protect whatever city-bound life she can this time.

中南美，玛雅神话中的善神兼创造神。
是庇护人类的善良神明，司掌着风与丰穰。
库库尔坎在尤卡坦玛雅语中意为『有羽之蛇』『有翼之蛇』。也有基切玛雅语中意义相同的古库玛兹（Gukumatz）之名。

「原来如此，我理解了！
　总而言之就是伟大的神明大人对吧！
　那么，我会照着这个方向努力表现的~！」

……这个库库尔坎，是不是有点儿不对啊？
1:
身高／体重：176cm·？？kg
出处：玛雅神话、异闻带米克特兰
地域：？？？
属性：秩序·善　　性别：女性
「诶，问我在行星上的重量吗？
　真是的，那种事情不要在意啦，不要在意！
　到了宇宙空间里的话你和我就都一样啦~！」
2:
○泛人类史中的库库尔坎
被视作玛雅神话体系中的至高存在之一，在玛雅潘、奇琴伊察、乌什玛尔等尤卡坦半岛各大都市中都建有祭祀库库尔坎的巨大神殿，聚集了巨量的信仰。
身为与创世和造人相关联的神明的同时，在被称作古库玛兹的时候，据说也司掌着带来破坏的暴风雨（Hurricane）。
与阿兹特克神话中的魁札尔·科亚特尔神被视为同一存在。

○泛人类史中的宝具
『疾风，自高天降临』
阶级：EX　种类：对人/对军宝具
有效范围：1~50　最大捕捉：1人/500人

Cakulha Huracan Kukulcan
身为风神的库库尔坎所使用的破坏之风。
作为伟大自然诸力之一，无可匹敌的神之淫威。
卡库尔哈·胡拉坎是身为飓风（Hurricane）一词语源的玛雅神名。胡拉坎神，据说是与库库尔坎一同参与了创世的暴风之神，而且在创世神话中曾一度掀起了导致先驱的人类灭绝这般程度的大灾害。
库库尔坎通过将自己的名字与胡拉坎的名字一起作为宝具名念出，能够将也存在于自身内部的一部分破坏之风的权能重新唤起。
3:
○性格
外向、主动。
一言以蔽之就是『清廉无垢且无懈可击的女神』。
相当直爽，却又很端庄，距离感很近，且博爱主义。单站在那里就闪闪发光。
会听人倾诉各种各样的烦恼，予以鼓励，并协助其调整状态，让其运势在之后越变越好。
即便不说话也闪得耀眼。甚至能够感受到她宇宙层面（过载级别）的慈爱。不如说已经是在物理层面上闪闪发光了。
但在最后，
还是个会念叨着「那么，也就只能战斗咯！」，
不管是怎样严酷的战场，都强制要求必须出战而且拿下胜利的无理女神。
「啊，这家伙根本就是不理解人类的内心啊」这一点，
无论是谁都能立刻理解。

最中意努力拼搏的生命，想要守护拥有可能性的生命，并且，梦想着能够和那样的生命们并肩战斗，某种意义上也是不谙世事的大小姐。
战斗时会叫着「好耶，是战斗！」突进上前的“巡航导弹”。


○动机·对御主的态度
自『对所有生命体的爱』当中诞生的库库尔坎，内心充满了爱意。
话虽如此，因为这份爱的判定基准是世界规模，所以没能转化为『人类层面的爱』。不过。

「和其他人类一样，都是我守护、观察的对象，不过……」
「把优先顺序，拔到超高的位置也可以吧？」

不曾知晓特别的存在、影响人生的搭档（Partner）为何物的库库尔坎，因为第一次有了“相互扶持的存在”而激动不已。
想再多了解一些。想再多交流一些。想再多触碰一些。以及，想再多品味一些。
库库尔坎尚不知晓，那就是对『与自己不同的生命』的爱恋。

要是让她知道了，根本就按捺不住。
4:
○阵地建造：—
泛人类史中的库库尔坎是风与文化之神，有时也与玛雅神话中的至高神伊察姆纳（Itzamna）被视为同一存在。如伊察姆纳（鬣蜥之家）之名所示，伊察姆纳既然被视为创世神，那么与其被视为同一存在的库库尔坎也就具备有最高阶级的阵地建造技能。
但那是泛人类史的库库尔坎。异闻带的库库尔坎并不具备这样的技能。

○文明建立：EX
泛人类史的库库尔坎拥有最高阶级的『道具作成』，但异闻带的库库尔坎并不擅长细腻的指尖层面的操作把控，所以很不擅长制作道具。
该说是作为替代呢还是怎么说呢，她所具备的是名为『文明建立』的，能够给原生生物们在最恰当的『生活』方面提供建议的才能。

○善神的神核：—
包含了神性的复合技能。
如果是泛人类史的库库尔坎的话会是最高阶级，
但异闻带的库库尔坎不具备神性。
本人也是会歪头疑惑「所谓的“神明大人”到底应该干什么啊~？」的程度，所以说她到底有没有正确理解人类所说的『神』的概念这一点都值得怀疑。

○生命之水：—
泛人类史的库库尔坎持有的技能。
藉由水来操纵生命的起源及其原理。以从天空与水（海）中创造了世界的传说，将水纳为其领域之一。
场地在水边时就可以期待诸多能力的提升，但异闻带的库库尔坎并不具备这一技能。
5:
○翡翠的魅力：A+
将泛人类史的库库尔坎持有的『水』与『风』属性统合为一的技能。
领袖魅力的亚种技能。库库尔坎所在之处，因暴击（Critical）而导致的意外死亡将不复存在。

○吾等，有翼之蛇：EX
泛人类史的库库尔坎是古库玛兹神，同时也是魁札尔·科亚特尔神。
不管是哪一位神明，在各自的地域的语言中都意味着『有羽之蛇』『有翼之蛇』，且二者神性的由来以及性质全都是一致的。
虽然是相近的地域，仍然可以说是被跨神话体系传颂的库库尔坎，能够暂时使用来自其他神话的『有翼之蛇』的能力。
这便是将那个权能以想象力模仿出来的产物。

○黄金树海纪行：EX
满怀着对无穷的天宇与不灭的太阳，以及虚空的憧憬，生活在树海当中的所有生命的梦。
作为虽说是被闭锁的，但也是一个世界的
生命的代表兼顶点而被设计出的，
库库尔坎的战斗模式。

简单来说就是『感觉超级有干劲儿！』这样的动机促进（Motivation Up），但到了库库尔坎这个级别就不只是唯心主义了，只要是她所处的空间，能量加速效率都会得到提升。『时间与空间好像也都充满干劲了呢！』，会认真地这样宣言。

『星体，自宇宙降临』
阶级：EX　种类：对界宝具
有效范围：1　最大捕捉：1人

作为ORT的心脏闪耀光辉时是Last Sun Xibalba。
以玛雅的创造神的身份闪耀光辉时则是Kinich Ahau Impact。或者El Castillo Kukulcan。

身为异闻带之王、ORT之心脏的奥尔特·库库尔坎的宝具。
原本是纤维型情报记忆体（通过菌类进行情报传递的极小生命）的『那位』们。
在南美遍地展开的植物根系的网络。
将一块大陆的所有灵脉中奔流的魔力集结起来，作为『库库尔坎』输出的姿态。
与某个真祖的暴露状态『光体』是同一种东西。
话虽如此，这边的最多只是表露了自地球之外而来的降临者要成为『地球的守护者』的意志，所以并不能发挥出事象收纳等与星之内海关联的能力。

○领域外生命：—
因为已经把地球视作故乡，这一技能已经失却。

○Archetype:ORT
在FGO的世界中，中南美神的起源被认为是『附着在落到地球的陨石上的纤维型情报记忆体与地球植物融合后的存在』。
植物不断茁壮而繁盛地生长，最终形成了覆盖了七成地表的巨大网络。
而这个库库尔坎是那个情报记忆体的最新型。
是将为使南美异闻带存续下去而使用的ORT的心脏，与星间外来种相融合从而制作（Design）出的生命体。

兼有着作为『领域外生命』的特色和『大地之头脑体』的特色。

The creator deity and god of goodness in Mayan mythology.

A god who embodies goodness and protects humanity, reigning over the winds and fertility.

In the Yucatec Mayan language, Kukulkan means “Feathered Serpent” or “Winged Serpent”. In Kʼicheʼ Mayan, Qʼuqʼumatz is her name, which means the same thing.


“I see, I get it!

So they’re an important god!

I’ll act like one too, then!”


… Isn’t there something wrong with this Kukulkan?
1:
Height/Weight: 176 cm / ?? kg

Source: Mayan Mythology, Mictlan Lostbelt

Region: ???

Attribute: Lawful Good

Gender: Female

“Eh? Weight on a planet?

Doesn’t matter to me, not at all!

You and I have the same weight in space!”
2:
• Kukulkan in Proper Human History

Considered to be one of the supreme existences in Mayan mythology, she attracted great worship across the Yucatan peninsula, where enormous temples were constructed in every city, including Mayapan, Chichen Itza, and Uxmal.

She is a god associated with the creation of the world and mankind, and is said to preside over destructive storms (hurricanes) when going by the name Qʼuqʼumatz.

She is said to be the same thing as Quetzalcoatl from Aztec myths.



• Noble Phantasm in Proper Human History

『O’ Winds, Descend from the Heavens』

Rank: EX

Type: Anti-Unit/Anti-Army Noble Phantasm

Range: 1~50

Maximum Targets: 1 person/ 500 people


Cakulha Huracan Kukulkan

Destructive winds brought forth by Kukulkan, the god of wind.

One of the greatest forces in nature, and the unresistable violence of a god.

Cakulha-Huracan is the name of the Mayan god who is the etymological root of the word ‘Hurricane’. Huracan was a storm god who was involved in the creation of the world, alongside Kukulkan, and once, during that creation myth, he caused a calamity great enough that it wiped out the preceding humans.


By crying Huracan’s name at the same time as her own while using this Noble Phantasm, Kukulkan can awaken a part of the Authority over destructive winds that exists within her too.
3:
• Personality Diplomatic and active. In short, “an impeccable and integrous goddess”. Extremely frank, and yet elegant, close to others, and philanthropic. Just by being present, she sparkles. She will hear out your various woes, cheer you on, ensure you’re in good health, and bring you good luck. She will sparkle, even when silent. She even feels a cosmic (overloading) affection. In other words, she’s physically sparkling. But in the end, she’ll say“Well then, we’ll just have to fight!”She’s an unreasonable goddess who will force you to go out, fight, and triumph, no matter how harsh the battlefield may be. Instantly, everyone will understand;“Ah, this lady fundamentally doesn’t understand human hearts.” She loves hard-working living beings, wishes to safeguard the lives of those who have possibilities, and dreams of fighting alongside such lifeforms, so in a sense, she is a sheltered young lady. In combat, she says “Yahoo, it’s a battle!” before rocketing in like a cruise missile. • Motive and Attitude towards her Master As Kukulkan was born from love aimed at all living things, she is brimming with affection. However, she cannot express “human-like love”, as her decisions are global in scale.
“You’re someone I’ll protect and watch over, just like any other human on the earth... But would it be ''that'' bad if I put you a bit higher on the priority list?”
Kukulkan, who never knew of a special being, a partner who would influence her life, is thoroughly thrilled to have met someone ‘who can give cooperative aid’ for the very first time. She wants to know more. She wants to talk more. She wants to feel more. She wants to experience even more. Kukulkan doesn’t know that this is love for a lifeform “different from oneself”. Once she does, there will be no backsies.
4:
• Territory Creation: -

In Proper Human History, Kukulkan is a god of the winds and of civilisation, and at times is regarded as being the same being as the supreme god Itzamna. As the name Itzamna (House of Itzam) would suggest, Itzamna is the creator of the world, so Kukulkan, who is in turn identified with him, holds a high Territory Creation rank.

But that’s the story of Proper Human History Kukulkan. The Kukulkan of the Lostbelt holds no such skill.


• Civilization Creation: EX

The Proper Human History Kukulkan has a supreme rank in Item Construction, but this Lostbelt Kukulkan has relatively poor control over her fingers’ fine movements, so she’s rather lacking in Item Construction.

As a substitute, she has a talent called “Civilisation Creation”, which furnishes her with the ability to give advice on the best “livelihood” to primordial creatures.


• Divine Core of the Good God: -

A composite skill that contains Divinity.

The Proper Human History Kukulkan would have the highest rank, but Lostbelt Kukulkan has no Divinity.

The person herself tilts her head and asks “What would a god do?”, so it’s doubtful that she even understands what the concept of a “god” is to humans.


• Water of Life: -

A skill owned by Proper Human History Kukulkan.

She can manipulate the principles and the origin of lifeforms through water. Water is one of the domains from the legend that the world was created from the skies and the waters (seas).

On a waterside field, many ability improvements could be expected, but Lostbelt Kukulkan lacks this.
5:
• Charisma of Jade: A+

A skill that combines the “water” and “wind” attributes that are held by Proper Human History Kukulkan.

A subspecies Charisma skill. Wherever Kukulkan is, accidental crit-based deaths will vanish.


• We, the Winged Serpent: EX

In Proper Human History, Kukulkan is Qʼuqʼumatz, and also Quetzalcoatl. These gods have a name meaning “feathered” or “winged serpent” in each of their respective languages, and both the origin and nature of their Divinity is identical.

Kukulkan, a god who is spoken of as one beyond the mythological systems of the local areas, can temporarily use the abilities of the other Feathered Serpents from other myths.

This is an imaginative interpretation of such Authorities.


• Golden Sea of Trees Travelogue: EX

The dreams of all life that lived within the Sea of Trees, filled with a yearning for the endless skies, the immortal sun, and empty space.

Kukulkan’s combat mode is designed to be the representation of the apex of a single world, although it is closed.


It’s like she’s saying “Now I’m motivated!”, and then her motivation goes up, but at Kukulkan’s level, it’s not just her mentality, but the energy acceleration efficiency of the entire space around her that rises. “Seems like time and space are getting motivated too!” she really does say it.
6:
『O’ Star, Descend from Space』

Rank: EX

Type: Anti-World Noble Phantasm

Range: 1

Maximum Targets: 1 person

When she shines as the heart of ORT, it is called Last Sun Xibalba.

When she shines as the Mayan creator deity, it is called Kinich Ahau Impact. Alternatively, El Castillo Kukulkan.


The Noble Phantasm of ORT Kukulkan, the Lostbelt King and ORT’s heart.

Originally, “her kind” were Fibre-type Information Storage Bodies (microscopic organisms that transferred information via fungi).

A network of plant roots that spread across South America.

A form that gathers all the magical energy that runs through the Spirit Veins of an entire continent and outputs it as “Kukulkan”.

It’s the same thing as the “Luminous Body”, which is the exposed state of a certain True Ancestor.

However, this is merely an extraterrestrial who fell to the Earth and set its sights upon being a “Guardian of the Earth”, so she is incapable of utilising abilities related to the Inner Sea of the Planet, such as Event Storage and the like.


• Lifeform of the Outer Domain: -

Already mourned for, as the Earth is her home.


• Archetype: ORT

In the world of FGO, the origins of the Latin American gods is said to be “Fibre-type Information Storage Bodies that were attached to a meteorite, crashed on Earth, and then fused with the Earth’s plantlife”.

The plants grew far and wide, and eventually became a singular network that covered 70% of the Earth’s landmasses.

This Kukulkan is the latest type of those Information Storage Bodies.

She is a lifeform created (designed) by fusing their interstellar alien species with ORT’s heart, which was used to keep the South American Lostbelt alive.


She possesses the characteristics of both “a lifeform of the outer domain” and those of a “Cerebral Corpus of the Lands”.

若安，是一位被认定为是架空存在的人物，
以女教皇若安之名为人所知。
她被用作数部小说、电影的创作题材，
相信她确实存在的人也不在少数。

在近些年的研究中，其实连她的传说究竟是怎样成立的，
这样的来龙去脉都已经得出结论了。

在那祈祷、祈祷，不断祈祷的尽头。
她究竟看到了什么呢。
1:
身高／体重：163cm·51kg
出处：传说故事
地域：欧洲全域
属性：秩序·善　　性别：女性
存在关于她的具体记载的例子，
有作于十三世纪50年代的『梅斯年谱（Chronicle of Metz）』等。
2:
女教皇若安。在九世纪中期被选为
教皇利奥四世的后继者的，历史上首位女教皇……
记录是如此叙述的。
实际上，她是十三世纪左右才得以成立的空想中的教皇，
并成为了反教皇主义、反教会主义者们
持续数个世纪之久的论争的标靶。

彻底证明了她确实不存在这一点，
则是十九世纪以后的事了。
3:
○对魔力：EX
因身为教皇之故，有着足堪夸耀的特级的对魔力。

○阵地建造：A
落座于教皇之玉座的瞬间，她就是无可置疑的
最高权力者。

○幻想的圣人：A
从史料判断，女教皇若安并非实际存在一事
已经完全明了。
但，发祥于十三世纪左右的这一传说，
至今依然不断地吸引着人们。
能够以拟似性质获得与圣人有关的技能。
阶级A的情况，其实基本和圣人也没差了。

○受忌避的仪仗队列：C
若安的传说之一。
据说后世的诸位教皇前往宫殿的时候，
都会忌讳、回避被认为是她曾经分娩和迎来死亡的街道。
通过与阵地建造相结合，
能够构筑出简易而坚固的
针对敌对者的结界。
如果是西方的反英雄的话，连靠近都难以做到。

○教皇论辩：EX
若安的存在，不仅关乎她究竟是否真的存在，
藉由她而发起的有关教会的腐败问题和思想等方面的主义、主张，
各个方面都被推上了议论、争辩的风口浪尖，
她的存在也一遍又一遍地被提起。
这些全部都成为了她的力量和信仰的源泉。
4:
『当受祈献者乃辉耀荣光之玉座』
阶级：A　种类：对人宝具（自身）
有效范围：0　最大捕捉：1人

Legendom Papa Thronus
编造出她就任了教皇的虚幻时光，并使之降临。
其强化效果无比强绝，哪怕只是一句圣言
也能拥有强大且牢固的物理干涉能力。
对于西方的，特别是对于和她所信奉的宗教有关的从者而言，哪怕只是站在那里都会感觉到压倒性的重压力。
5:
○性格
她即是所谓想象中的存在，
但也是自诸多的祈祷中显现的从者。
因此，理解了自身的虚幻的她，
决心要尽可能长久且深刻地，
将自己存在的证明刻印在现世之上。

真挚地祈祷，真挚地讨论神明与宗教的话题，
真挚地过好生活的方方面面，
她认为这些都没问题。

不过，不可否认的是，
因为她基本上摆脱不了柔和的气质和氛围，
所以看上去多少有些欠缺严肃感。

如果和她亲密起来的话，「莫非这个人，
其实意外地凶狠而且粗枝大叶？」这样的印象也会愈发强烈。

为了能够健康、爽快、友好的彼此共存，
毫无遗恨的互殴总而言之也没问题。

虽然是不认为屈从强者也没问题，
但若是为了弱者，甚至可以赌上性命。
体现了身为信仰神明之人的正确存在方式。
就算她只是架空、虚构的存在，也可以说
她完全具备有与教皇的身份相配的精神性。
